original: @187b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @187b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i sa manta bha dra s'a dha na britti /
analyzed: shr'i sa manta bha dra s'a dha na britti /
translated: Śrī-Samantabhadra-sādhana-vṛtti

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: dpal kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa /
translated: The Commentary on the Means of Attaining the Glorious Samantabhadra

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Mañjuvajra.

original: slob dpon rje btsun sangs rgyas ye shes kyis dam pa rnams kyi spyod pa rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir dang por bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal ba rtsom par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: slob dpon rje btsun sangs rgyas ye shes kyis dam pa rnams kyi spyod pa rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir dang por bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal ba rtsom par byed pa yin la /
translated: Master Venerable Buddhajñānapāda, in order to accomplish the conduct of the holy ones, begins by paying homage to the Blessed Mañjuvajra.

original: de'i dgos pa yang 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i dgos pa yang 'di yin te /
translated: The purpose of that is as follows:

original: bsod nams mngon par 'phel ba dang / bgegs nye bar zhi ba dang / 'chad pa po dang / nyan pa po dag gi bshad pa dang / thos pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsod nams mngon par 'phel ba dang / bgegs nye bar zhi ba dang / 'chad pa po dang / nyan pa po dag gi bshad pa dang / thos pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: For the sake of the manifest increase of merit, the pacification of obstacles, and the perfection of explanation and listening for both the expounder and the listener.

original: phyag 'tshal ba de yang yon tan dam pa gsal bar brjod pa'i sgo nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag bya ba'i tshul yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba de yang yon tan dam pa gsal bar brjod pa'i sgo nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag bya ba'i tshul yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: That homage should be seen as the way of paying homage with body, speech, and mind through the expression of sublime qualities.

original: de la yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod pa ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod pa ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the expression of true qualities should be seen as the cause of the perfection of one's own aim and the perfection of one's own aim itself, and as the cause of the perfection of others' aims and the perfection of others' aims itself.

original: de la dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal ba yin te /
analyzed: de la dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal ba yin te /
translated: Here, this [verse] beginning with Glorious is a homage to the Blessed One Mañjuvajra.
Here,

original: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das khyad par du gyur par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das khyad par du gyur par blta bar bya'o //
translated: the Blessed One should be seen as distinguished by the excellence of his splendor.

original: de yang spyi'i don na 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yang spyi'i don na 'di yin te /
translated: And that is the general meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gang yin pa de ni dpal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzi brjid rnams kyis 'bar zhing mdzes la brgyan par gyur pa'i 'jam dpal de la mchod par bya ba'i phyir de la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i man🔽ngag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal bsgom pa'i cho ga dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i tshul bshad par bya'o zhes /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gang yin pa de ni dpal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzi brjid rnams kyis 'bar zhing mdzes la brgyan par gyur pa'i 'jam dpal de la mchod par bya ba'i phyir de la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i man ngag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal bsgom pa'i cho ga dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i tshul bshad par bya'o zhes /
translated: The Blessed One, who is Mañjuśrī, is adorned with the splendor of glory and so forth, blazing and beautiful. In order to worship that Mañjuśrī, having bowed to him, the Blessed One, the master, says:

original: bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyis gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das slob dpon gyis gsungs pa yin no //
translated: I will explain the method of the first application and so forth, the ritual of meditating on the Blessed Mañjuśrī with the oral instructions of the glorious Guhyasamāja.

original: yan lag gi don yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yan lag gi don yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: The subsidiary meaning should also be stated.

original: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: Glory has the characteristic of the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: de gang la yod pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa de ni dpal ldan no //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa de ni dpal ldan no //
translated: The glorious one is endowed with the splendor that exists in that.

original: 'dis ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This states the cause of one's own perfection.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The accumulations of merit and direct intuition are the cause of the knowledge of all the aspects.

original: 'di dag gis ni tshangs pa la sogs pa yang dgar ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni tshangs pa la sogs pa yang dgar ba yin te /
translated: By these, Brahma and so on are also praised.

original: gal te na 'jig rten pa'i dpal don du gnyer ba la mngon par zhen pa dag 'di dag yin par 'dzin par byed pas de'i phyir dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te na 'jig rten pa'i dpal don du gnyer ba la mngon par zhen pa dag 'di dag yin par 'dzin par byed pas de'i phyir dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: If they are not, then they are those who are attached to the pursuit of mundane glory, and so he says: glorious, etc.

original: 'di'i dpal gyi sgra ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ston pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i dpal gyi sgra ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ston pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word 'glory' here has the sense of the accumulation of merit and direct intuition.

original: mi shes kun sngags zhes bya ba la /🔽mi shes pa kun ni ma rig pa ma lus pa ste /
analyzed: mi shes kun sngags zhes bya ba la / mi shes pa kun ni ma rig pa ma lus pa ste /
translated: The destruction of all nescience

original: de spangs pa ni bsal pa'o ;
analyzed: de spangs pa ni bsal pa'o ;
translated: The destruction of all nescience is the complete removal of nescience.

original: / de yang gzi brjid gang gis mi shes pa thams cad spangs pa de nyid kyis na dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: / de yang gzi brjid gang gis mi shes pa thams cad spangs pa de nyid kyis na dri ma med pa'o //
translated: And that is stainless by virtue of the very same brilliance which destroys all nescience.

original: mi shes pa kun spangs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: mi shes pa kun spangs pa yang yin la /
translated: It is the destruction of all nescience,

original: dri ma med pa nyid kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: dri ma med pa nyid kyang yin pas na /
translated: and it is stainless.

original: mi shes kun spangs dri med gzi brjid ldan //
analyzed: mi shes kun spangs dri med gzi brjid ldan //
translated: They are stainless, radiant, and have abandoned all ignorance.🔽

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: He is endowed with stainless splendor, having abandoned all ignorance.

original: 'dis ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa yin te /
translated: This explains the perfection of his own aim.

original: gzi brjid dri ma med pa nyid kyis dri ma med pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzi brjid dri ma med pa nyid kyis dri ma med pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By his stainlessness and splendor, he is characterized as having the knowledge of omniscience.

original: de ltar na 'di dag gis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag las kyang dgar ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na 'di dag gis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag las kyang dgar ba yin te /
translated: Thus, he is distinguished from the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams @188b kyis rab brgyan zhing //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams @188b kyis rab brgyan zhing // zhes bya ba la /
translated: He is adorned with the emanations of his immeasurable family.

original: dpag tu med pa yang yin la rigs kyang yin pas dpag med rigs te /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa yang yin la rigs kyang yin pas dpag med rigs te /
translated: The immeasurable family is the immeasurable family because it is immeasurable and a family.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams yin par blta bar bya la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams yin par blta bar bya la /
translated: It should be seen as the family of the Tathagatas, etc.

original: de rnams kyi sprul pa ni sprul par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sprul pa ni sprul par byas pa'o //
translated: His emanations are the emanations of those.

original: de nyid kyi rgyan gang la yod pa de ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rgyan gang la yod pa de ni /
translated: He is adorned with them,

original: dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing //
analyzed: dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing //
translated: he who is adorned with the emanations of his immeasurable family.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is.

original: 'dis ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This teaches the perfection of the benefit of others,

original: gzhan gyi don gyi phyir sprul pa rnams rnam par 'gyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi phyir sprul pa rnams rnam par 'gyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because emanations are sent forth for the benefit of others.

original: 'di dag gis ni rnal 'byor gong ma'i blo rnam par bsal nas rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i blo la gzhag par bya ba'i phyir shes rab yan lag 'dus pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni rnal 'byor gong ma'i blo rnam par bsal nas rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i blo la gzhag par bya ba'i phyir shes rab yan lag 'dus pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to clear away the understanding of the higher yoga and establish it in the understanding of the unsurpassed yoga, he says the branch of wisdom is gathered.

original: shes rab ni rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i rig pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab ni rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i rig pa ste /
translated: Wisdom is the awareness that appears as its own nature.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin par blta bar bya la /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin par blta bar bya la /
translated: It should be seen as having the nature of nondual intuition.

original: de'i yan lag ni shes rab yan lag go //
analyzed: de'i yan lag ni shes rab yan lag go //
translated: Its branch is the branch of wisdom.

original: der 'dus pa ni shes rab yan lag 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: der 'dus pa ni shes rab yan lag 'dus pa ste /
translated: Gathered there is the gathering of the branch of wisdom.

original: des 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pas na shes rab yan lag 'dus pas 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pas na shes rab yan lag 'dus pas 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it blazes and shines with that, it is called the blazing and shining of the gathering of the branch of wisdom.

original: 'dis ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This teaches the cause of the perfection of the benefit of others.

original: shes rab rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi gzi brjid ni gzhan gyi don gyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi gzi brjid ni gzhan gyi don gyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The splendor of those endowed with pure wisdom is the cause of the benefit of others.

original: 'jam pa ni mnyen pa ste /
analyzed: 'jam pa ni mnyen pa ste /
translated: Smoothness is softness.

original: thams cad kyis nye bar longs spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyis nye bar longs spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the enjoyment of all.

original: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can te /
translated: Glory is the characteristic of merit and wisdom.

original: de gang la yod pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He who has that is glorious.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i gzi brjid kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'jam dpal de la mngon par phyag 'tshal ba ste /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i gzi brjid kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'jam dpal de la mngon par phyag 'tshal ba ste /
translated: He is Mañjuśrī, who is superior by the special splendor just mentioned.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having bowed to him with body, speech, and mind, one should apply: “I will explain the rite.”

original: 'dis ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ldan pa'i phyag bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ldan pa'i phyag bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This states the homage with body, speech, and mind.

original: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs zhes bya ba ni gzhung gzhan dag las dgar ba'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs zhes bya ba ni gzhung gzhan dag las dgar ba'o //
translated: The system of the glorious Guhyasamāja is distinguished from other scriptures.

original: de la 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin par bshad @189a * //
analyzed: de la 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin par bshad @189a * //
translated: The word collection is explained as being Vajrasattva because of possessing the characteristics of all the Buddhas.

original: la ; de ston par gyur pa yin pas na nye bar gdags pas gzhung la yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: la ; de ston par gyur pa yin pas na nye bar gdags pas gzhung la yang de skad ces bya ste /
translated: And because he is the teacher, the treatise is also called that, by a secondary use of expression,

original: tha mi dad par bshad pa'i tshul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad par bshad pa'i tshul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is explained in an inseparable way.

original: bshes gnyen dam pa yis ni bskul phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bshes gnyen dam pa yis ni bskul phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because of the urging of the excellent friend.

original: bshes gnyen dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: bshes gnyen dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: The excellent friend is the Tathagatas.

original: de la bskul ba ni gsol ba btab pas de'i bka' thob pa ste /
analyzed: de la bskul ba ni gsol ba btab pas de'i bka' thob pa ste /
translated: Urging is the request, and the obtaining of his permission.

original: bskul ba 'di ni nye bar gdags pas bka' thob pa la de skad bshad do //
analyzed: bskul ba 'di ni nye bar gdags pas bka' thob pa la de skad bshad do //
translated: This urging is called the obtaining of permission by a secondary use of expression.

original: bka' thob pa des na spro bar byas pa'i nye bar gdags pa'i dgos pa dang bdag nyid rang dga' yongs su sngags pa'i don to //
analyzed: bka' thob pa des na spro bar byas pa'i nye bar gdags pa'i dgos pa dang bdag nyid rang dga' yongs su sngags pa'i don to //
translated: And by that obtaining of permission, the purpose of the secondary use of expression is the encouragement, and the meaning of the self-delight is the dedication.

original: yang na dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i man ngag gis so //
analyzed: yang na dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i man ngag gis so //
translated: Or else, the system called glorious Guhyasamaja is the instruction of the glorious Guhyasamaja.

original: bshes gnyen dam pa yis ni skul phyir spro bya ste /
analyzed: bshes gnyen dam pa yis ni skul phyir spro bya ste /
translated: One should be inspired by the urging of holy friends.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: bshes gnyen dam pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen te /
analyzed: bshes gnyen dam pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen te /
translated: holy friends are spiritual friends,

original: slob dpon rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: slob dpon rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: masters and Tathagatas.

original: de rnams la bskul ba ni bsnyen bkur byas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams la bskul ba ni bsnyen bkur byas pa ste /
translated: Urging them is serving them.

original: des spro bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no //
analyzed: des spro bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag yin no //
translated: I am the one who is inspired by that.

original: de bas na bshes gnyen dam pas bskul ba'i phyir spro bar byas te cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa 'dis ni gzhung rtsom pa'i rgyu gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bshes gnyen dam pas bskul ba'i phyir spro bar byas te cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa 'dis ni gzhung rtsom pa'i rgyu gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because I am inspired by the urging of holy friends, I will explain the rite. This verse states the reason for composing the treatise.🔽Now,

original: da ni / bstan bcos dag ni thams cad dang // las rnams ci yang rung ba la //🔽ji srid dgos pa ma smras pa //
analyzed: da ni / bstan bcos dag ni thams cad dang // las rnams ci yang rung ba la // ji srid dgos pa ma smras pa //
translated: all treatises and any rites

original: de srid su yang 'dzin mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de srid su yang 'dzin mi 'gyur //
translated: will not be taken up by anyone

original: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni /
translated: until their purpose is stated.

original: bstan bcos kyi dang por nyan pa po'i skye bo rnams kyi 'jug pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i brjod pa dang / dgos pa la sogs pa dag brjod dgos pas 'gro ba ma lus don ni phun sum tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni brjod par bya ba dang /
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi dang por nyan pa po'i skye bo rnams kyi 'jug pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i brjod pa dang / dgos pa la sogs pa dag brjod dgos pas 'gro ba ma lus don ni phun sum tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni brjod par bya ba dang /
translated: At the beginning of the treatise, he must state the subject matter, purpose, etc. , which are the limbs of engagement for the persons who are the audience.

original: dgos pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //🔽de yang 'gro ba rnams kyi don yin pas na 'gro ba'i don te /
analyzed: dgos pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no // de yang 'gro ba rnams kyi don yin pas na 'gro ba'i don te /
translated: Therefore, he states the subject matter, purpose, etc. , with the words:🔽The perfect fulfillment of the aims of all beings.

original: mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽de'i phun sum tshogs pa ni 'gro ba ma lus don ni phun sum tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid do // de'i phun sum tshogs pa ni 'gro ba ma lus don ni phun sum tshogs pa ste /
translated: The aim of beings is the characteristic of the high status and the definite goodness.

original: 'gro ba ma lus pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug par gyur pa @189b gang yin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug par gyur pa @189b gang yin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: The perfect fulfillment of the aim of all beings is the perfect fulfillment of the aim of all beings, which is the ultimate of buddhahood for all beings.

original: de'i rgyur gyur pa ni byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i cho ga gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyur gyur pa ni byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i cho ga gang yin pa ste /
translated: The cause of that is the ritual that is the causal process.

original: de bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa'o //
translated: That is what is explained.

original: 'dis ni cho ga'i brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni cho ga'i brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is the statement of the subject matter and purpose of the rite.

original: cho ga zhes bya ba'i sgra ni brjod par bya ba yang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: cho ga zhes bya ba'i sgra ni brjod par bya ba yang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The word “rite” is also a statement of the subject matter.

original: 'brel pa ston par byed pa'i sgra ni mngon sum du med mod kyi /
analyzed: 'brel pa ston par byed pa'i sgra ni mngon sum du med mod kyi /
translated: The word that expresses the connection is not directly stated.

original: de ni shugs kyis gsungs bar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ni shugs kyis gsungs bar blta bar bya ste /
translated: But it is to be understood by implication.

original: de yang 'dir cho ga ni brjod par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de yang 'dir cho ga ni brjod par bya ba yin la /
translated: And here the rite is the subject matter.
