original: de ltar gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the perfect place in this way,

original: da ni cho ga gang gis bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bya ba'i cho ga de bstan par bya @191b ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni cho ga gang gis bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bya ba'i cho ga de bstan par bya @191b ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the rite by which the Blessed Lady is realized,

original: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “first,” and so on.

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni /🔽mtshan mo'i brgyad cha thun phyed du ji lta bar gyur pa'am /
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni / mtshan mo'i brgyad cha thun phyed du ji lta bar gyur pa'am /
translated: “First” means🔽that one should visualize the syllable ma or ma in the middle of the moon at the heart, as before, for half the period of one watch of the night,

original: yang na dang por te bsam gtan gyi thog mar snying gar zla ba'i dbus su m'am rnam par bkod cing m'am bsams la /
analyzed: yang na dang por te bsam gtan gyi thog mar snying gar zla ba'i dbus su m'am rnam par bkod cing m'am bsams la /
translated: or else at the beginning, at the outset of meditation.

original: gdong la sogs pa dag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gdong la sogs pa dag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should apply “one should purify the face and so on.”

original: nang par zhes bya ba ni nang par gyi thun mtshams so //
analyzed: nang par zhes bya ba ni nang par gyi thun mtshams so //
translated: “Morning” is the period of the morning watch.

original: nang par zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pas nyi ma phyed la sogs pa'i thun mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: nang par zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pas nyi ma phyed la sogs pa'i thun mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The example of morning indicates that one should do the same at the junctions of the periods of day and night, such as noon, etc.

original: khyad par ji lta bu'i m'am rnam par dgod ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu'i m'am rnam par dgod ce na /
translated: What is the special kind of mother or goddess?

original: dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i zhes bya bar gsungs te /
analyzed: dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i zhes bya bar gsungs te /
translated: She is called the mother or goddess who radiates stainless light rays.

original: gang las dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba de ni dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i m'am mo //
analyzed: gang las dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba de ni dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i m'am mo //
translated: She is the mother or goddess who radiates stainless light rays, because stainless light rays radiate from her.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid ces ming du grags pa gang yin pa de'i m'am de la ni de nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid ces ming du grags pa gang yin pa de'i m'am de la ni de nyid ces pa'o //
translated: The word reality is a name for thatness. She is the mother or goddess of that reality.

original: ji lta bur gyur pas gdong la sogs pa yang dag par bya zhe na brtser ldan pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pas gdong la sogs pa yang dag par bya zhe na brtser ldan pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In what way should one purify one's face, etc.? With compassion, it is said.

original: gang yang sngar snying rje'i stobs kyis ni zhes gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang yang gsungs pa ni 'di gtso bo yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang yang sngar snying rje'i stobs kyis ni zhes gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang yang gsungs pa ni 'di gtso bo yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: Although it was said above that through the power of compassion, it is said again in order to show that this is the principal cause.

original: 'gro ba ma lus gdon pa'i sems su bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus gdon pa'i sems su bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the verse is: one should have the thought to rescue all beings without exception.

original: snying brtse ba dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir thabs rnams la mngon par sbyor te /
analyzed: snying brtse ba dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir thabs rnams la mngon par sbyor te /
translated: One who is full of compassion applies himself to the means of destroying suffering.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i thabs las byung ba de'i rgyus de bshad pa ni dka' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul lo //🔽sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag par bya//
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i thabs las byung ba de'i rgyus de bshad pa ni dka' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul lo // sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag par bya//
translated: The explanation of that by means of the means that are hidden is difficult, because of the cause of that.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning of the verse is: one should purify the doors and so on.

original: sgo ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste /
analyzed: sgo ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste /
translated: The doors are the three doors of liberation,

original: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: which have the characteristics of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: de la sogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni sgo la sogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni sgo la sogs pa yin la /
translated: The doors and so on are those that are the foundations of mindfulness and so on.

original: de nyid yang dag par dag pa ni sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid yang dag par dag pa ni sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of those is the purification of the doors and so on.

original: dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dngos por gyur par byas nas de bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dngos por gyur par byas nas de bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having made the place into a suitable place, such as the initial preparation, one should meditate. This is the meaning.

original: tsandan bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: tsandan bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With excellent sandalwood, etc.

original: tsandan bzang po la sogs pas byugs pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas @192a * //
analyzed: tsandan bzang po la sogs pas byugs pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas @192a * //
translated: In the place of meditation anointed with excellent sandalwood, etc.

original: su nang tshang can la sogs pa'i stan la 'dug ste /
analyzed: su nang tshang can la sogs pa'i stan la 'dug ste /
translated: , sitting on a cushion filled with cotton, etc.🔽, having visualized the Buddhas, one should confess evil deeds, etc.

original: sangs rgyas rnams dmigs nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽tsandan bzang po la sogs kyis byugs shing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dmigs nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro // tsandan bzang po la sogs kyis byugs shing /
translated: , preceded by worship.🔽Anointed with excellent sandalwood, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni tsandan bzang po la sogs pas bsgos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tsandan bzang po la sogs pas bsgos pa'o //
translated: means anointed with excellent sandalwood, etc.

original: dri zhim me tog gcal bkram mchog gi cha'i //
analyzed: dri zhim me tog gcal bkram mchog gi cha'i //
translated: With a supreme portion of fragrant flowers strewn about.

original: zhes bya ba ni shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog rnams gcal du bkram pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas gang yin pa de ni dri zhim me tog gcal du bkram pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog rnams gcal du bkram pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas gang yin pa de ni dri zhim me tog gcal du bkram pa ste /
translated: That place of meditation where very fragrant flowers are strewn about is fragrant flowers strewn about.

original: de des mchog ces bya ba dam par 'gyur pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni mchog gi cha ste /
analyzed: de des mchog ces bya ba dam par 'gyur pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni mchog gi cha ste /
translated: That which is the best is the best part.

original: dri zhim pa'i me tog gi gcal bkram pa yang yin la /
analyzed: dri zhim pa'i me tog gi gcal bkram pa yang yin la /
translated: It is a spread of fragrant flowers,

original: mchog gi cha yang yin pas na dri zhim me tog gcal bkram mchog gi cha ste /
analyzed: mchog gi cha yang yin pas na dri zhim me tog gcal bkram mchog gi cha ste /
translated: and it is the best part.

original: bsam gtan gyi gnas der bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi gnas der bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dmigs par bya ste /
translated: Having sat on a comfortable seat in that place of concentration, one should visualize the buddhas of the three times.🔽The buddhas of the three times are the past, future, and present buddhas.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa ste de rnams dmigs shing 'di la byas nas so //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa ste de rnams dmigs shing 'di la byas nas so //
translated: Having made them the object,

original: sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin rnams ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin rnams ni //
translated: one should visualize the clouds of various offerings.🔽First, one should emanate the clouds of various offerings.

original: dang por spro sogs zhes bya ba la sna tshogs mchod pa ni yi ge mam gyi 'od zer las sprul pa'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: dang por spro sogs zhes bya ba la sna tshogs mchod pa ni yi ge mam gyi 'od zer las sprul pa'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
translated: The various offerings are the goddesses such as Rupavajra, emanated from the light rays of the syllable mam.

original: de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs te /
translated: The clouds of those are the masses of those.

original: de rnams dang por spro ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang por spro ba'o //
translated: First, one should emanate those.

original: de la sogs pa ni gang bstod pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni gang bstod pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on for praise and so on.

original: de lta bu'i sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnams dang por spros te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnams dang por spros te /
translated: One should first emanate clouds of such various offerings.

original: de nyid dang por byas pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang por byas pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is first done, such as confession of sins and so on, is called that.

original: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: blo ldan zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The wise one is endowed with wisdom.

original: bshags par bya ba dang bshags po dang bshags pa mi dmigs pa'i don te /
analyzed: bshags par bya ba dang bshags po dang bshags pa mi dmigs pa'i don te /
translated: The meaning of non-apprehension of the object to be confessed, the confessor, and the confession.

original: de dag kyang 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pas bya zhing nyams su blang ba'o //🔽dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pas bya zhing nyams su blang ba'o // dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Those should also be done and practiced in the sequence explained below.🔽In order to increase the virtues,

original: zhes bya ba ni bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //🔽sdig pa dag ni bshags pa la sogs bya //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro // sdig pa dag ni bshags pa la sogs bya //
translated: for the sake of the manifest increase of merit.🔽One should confess sins and so on,

original: zhes bya @192b ba ni sdig pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya @192b ba ni sdig pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o //
translated: one should confess sins as they are.

original: da ni ji ltar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni ji ltar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate how to perform the confession of sins and so forth, it is said:🔽

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate how one should perform the confession of vile actions and so forth, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Whatever defilements,” and so on.

original: srid pa'i chu klung ni srid pa'i rgyun te /
analyzed: srid pa'i chu klung ni srid pa'i rgyun te /
translated: In the river of existence, the stream of existence,

original: der ma lus pa'i kun du rtog pa dag gis kun du bsags pa'i rnyog pa gang yin pa de rnams cho ga bzhin du bshags par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: der ma lus pa'i kun du rtog pa dag gis kun du bsags pa'i rnyog pa gang yin pa de rnams cho ga bzhin du bshags par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: whatever defilements are collected by all the conceptual thoughts without exception, those [I] confess in accordance with the rite.

original: ma lus pa yang yin la kun du rtog pa yang yin pas na ma lus kun rtog ste /
analyzed: ma lus pa yang yin la kun du rtog pa yang yin pas na ma lus kun rtog ste /
translated: Since they are without exception and are conceptual thoughts, they are the conceptual thoughts without exception.

original: bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa'i kun du rtog pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa'i kun du rtog pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: The conceptual thoughts of “I” and “mine,” and so on, are the causes of the afflictions such as desire.

original: des na de dag gis bsags shing nye bar bsdus pas na ma lus kun rtog gis bsags zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na de dag gis bsags shing nye bar bsdus pas na ma lus kun rtog gis bsags zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since they are collected and accumulated by them, they are called “collected by the conceptual thoughts without exception.”

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: thog med srid pa'i chu klung du //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: thog med srid pa'i chu klung du //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In the river of existence without beginning.

original: srid pa'i chu klung gang yin pa 'di la ni thog ma yod pa ma yin pas na thog med de /
analyzed: srid pa'i chu klung gang yin pa 'di la ni thog ma yod pa ma yin pas na thog med de /
translated: This river of existence has no beginning, and thus it is beginningless.

original: de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 'khor ba la ni thog ma med de /
analyzed: de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 'khor ba la ni thog ma med de /
translated: The Bhagavån has said, “Monks, cyclic existence has no beginning.

original: de'i sngon gyi mtha' mi shes so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sngon gyi mtha' mi shes so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The prior limit of sentient beings’ transmigration is not discerned.”

original: thugs rje cher ldan spyan sngar de dag ni //🔽cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi //
analyzed: thugs rje cher ldan spyan sngar de dag ni // cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi //
translated: In the presence of those who possess great compassion,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: I confess all of them in accordance with the rite.

original: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar te /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar te /
translated: In the presence of the Buddhas who possess great compassion,

original: mdun du sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnyog pa de dag ni cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba bshags par bya ba dang bshags pa po dang / bshags pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad de ma lus pa bshags par bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mdun du sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnyog pa de dag ni cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba bshags par bya ba dang bshags pa po dang / bshags pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad de ma lus pa bshags par bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
translated: in front of them, I confess all of those impurities that have the character described above, in accordance with the rite, that is, by means of the non-apprehension of the one who confesses, the confession, and that which is confessed.

original: sogs pa'i sgras bstan pa'i bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras bstan pa'i bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The words “and so on” are stated in order to indicate rejoicing in the merit and so on.🔽Whatever virtue has been accomplished by the perfect Buddhas,

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa //
translated: the Bodhisattvas, and the other Noble Ones,

original: de dag kun la yang dag yi rang zhing //
analyzed: de dag kun la yang dag yi rang zhing //
translated: in all of that I rejoice,

original: byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and I dedicate it to enlightenment.

original: de la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: de la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
translated: Therein, the perfect Buddhas are the lords of the maṇḍala.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams so //🔽'phags pa ni pha rol @193a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams so // 'phags pa ni pha rol @193a * //
translated: The Bodhisattvas are the deities of the maṇḍala.

original: tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas pa rnams so //
analyzed: tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas pa rnams so //
translated: The Noble Ones are those who have attained Buddhahood by the method of the perfections.

original: gzhan ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: The others are the Śrāvakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni spyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad do //
analyzed: yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni spyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad do //
translated: Or, the perfect Buddhas are generally all the Blessed Buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni sa bcu la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni sa bcu la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams so //
translated: The Bodhisattvas are those who are well-established on the ten stages.

original: 'phags pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: 'phags pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: The noble ones are the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: gzhan ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i sems can rnams te /
analyzed: gzhan ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i sems can rnams te /
translated: The others are beings who have faith in the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha.🔽Whatever virtues they have performed, to all of them without exception, the perfect Buddha rejoices.

original: de rnams kyis dge ba gang zhig mdzad pa de dag ma lus pa kun la yang dag par sangs rgyas kyis rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis dge ba gang zhig mdzad pa de dag ma lus pa kun la yang dag par sangs rgyas kyis rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o zhes smos pa'o //
translated: I rejoice in them all.

original: byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
analyzed: byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
translated: I dedicate them all to enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba la 'dir yang yang dag pa'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'dir yang yang dag pa'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Here too, the word “perfect” should be supplied.

original: yang dag cing phyin ci ma log pa'i yongs su bsngo bas sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag cing phyin ci ma log pa'i yongs su bsngo bas sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By means of a perfect, unerring dedication, I dedicate them in accordance with the approval of the Buddhas.

original: da ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi rol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi rol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach going for refuge to the Three Jewels, he says the mental dance, etc.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should add: “I go for refuge to the Sugatas.”

original: ji lta bu'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams she na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams she na /
translated: What kind of Sugatas?

original: yid kyi rol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: yid kyi rol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says: the mental play, etc.

original: yid kyang yin la rol pa yang yin pas na yid kyi rol pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyang yin la rol pa yang yin pas na yid kyi rol pa ste /
translated: It is a mental play because it is both mental and a play.

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems la ni yid kyi rol pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems la ni yid kyi rol pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The mental play is called the stainless moon because it is free from all afflictions.

original: yid kyi rol pa de nyid ni dri med zla ba ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rol pa de nyid ni dri med zla ba ste /
translated: That mental play itself is the stainless moon.

original: dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang chos mthun pas na dri med zla 'dra ste /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang chos mthun pas na dri med zla 'dra ste /
translated: It is like the stainless moon because it is similar to the stainless moon.

original: ji ltar dri ma med pa'i zla ba ni 'gro ba ma lus pa tshim par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: ji ltar dri ma med pa'i zla ba ni 'gro ba ma lus pa tshim par byed pa yin la /
translated: Just as the stainless moon satisfies the entire world,🔽so also does the thought of awakening.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dra zhes pa la /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dra zhes pa la /
translated: Therefore, the mental play is like the stainless moon.

original: des bsgrubs pa ni bskyed pa yin pas na /
analyzed: des bsgrubs pa ni bskyed pa yin pas na /
translated: Since it is produced by that,

original: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs //
analyzed: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs //
translated: it is produced by the mental play, the stainless moon.

original: zhes bya'o // snying rje dam pa ni thugs rje chen po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // snying rje dam pa ni thugs rje chen po ste /
translated: The highest compassion is great compassion.

original: de mtha' yas shing tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: de mtha' yas shing tshad med pa'o //
translated: It is infinite and immeasurable.🔽It is the method, since it is the means.

original: de nyid ni thabs su gyur pa yang yin pas na snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa'i thabs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni thabs su gyur pa yang yin pas na snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa'i thabs zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called the infinite method of the highest compassion.

original: snying rje @193b dam pa'i thabs dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du gyur pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: snying rje @193b dam pa'i thabs dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du gyur pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it possesses the method of the highest compassion, it is for the benefit of oneself and others.

original: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs pa yang yin la /
translated: It is accomplished by the stainless moon-like mental play.

original: snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa'i thabs kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa'i thabs kyang yin pas na /
translated: It is the infinite method of the highest compassion.🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs //
analyzed: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs //
translated: The stainless moon-like mental play accomplishes

original: snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yi thabs //
analyzed: snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yi thabs //
translated: The infinite method of the highest compassion.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It has the nature of method and wisdom.

original: rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yin //
analyzed: rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yin //
translated: It abides in one's own mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi yid la gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de ni rang gi yid la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi yid la gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de ni rang gi yid la gnas pa'o //
translated: That which has the nature of abiding in one's own mind is abiding in one's own mind.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rnal 'byor pa'i yid la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i yid la gnas pa ste /
translated: It abides in the mind of the yogi.

original: rang gi sems las gzhan yod pa ma yin pas rang gi yid sems so sor snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi sems las gzhan yod pa ma yin pas rang gi yid sems so sor snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since it does not exist apart from one's own mind, it is the appearance of one's own mind. This is the meaning.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du ste /
translated: Always means until the end of the essence of enlightenment,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa ltar ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa ltar ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: not just for as long as one lives, as in the vehicle of the śrāvakas.

original: rtog pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rtog pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to all conceptual thoughts, etc.,

original: 'dir yang dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: here too, I go for refuge to the true Dharma.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is its distinction?

original: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
analyzed: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
translated: It is completely liberated from all conceptual thoughts.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i kun du rtog pa gang yin pa 'di la med cing nges par grol la rnam par spangs pas na /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i kun du rtog pa gang yin pa 'di la med cing nges par grol la rnam par spangs pas na /
translated: Since it is devoid of, definitely liberated from, and completely free from the conceptualization that has the nature of being produced by the unreal, such as the apprehended and apprehender, self and entities connected to the self, etc.,

original: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
analyzed: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
translated: it is completely liberated from all conceptualization.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the nature of nondual wisdom.

original: de gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /🔽sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs gzhi //
analyzed: de gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na / sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs gzhi //
translated: Moreover, what is its distinction?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is the basis for the perfection of all sublime beings.

original: sems dpa' yang yin la dam pa yang yin pas sems dpa' dam pa ste /🔽byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
analyzed: sems dpa' yang yin la dam pa yang yin pas sems dpa' dam pa ste / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
translated: It is a sublime being because it is both a being and sublime.

original: de rnams kyi yang dag pa'i phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi yin pas na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang dag pa'i phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi yin pas na /
translated: It is the basis for the perfection of all sublime beings, the great bodhisattvas, up to the perfection of buddhahood.

original: sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi zhes bya'o //🔽sems dpa' dam pa @194a * //
analyzed: sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi zhes bya'o // sems dpa' dam pa @194a * //
translated: It is called the basis of the perfection of all holy beings.

original: kun gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: kun gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The basis of the perfection of all holy beings is

original: dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid //
translated: the nature of the one taste of all things.

original: ces kyang bya ste /
analyzed: ces kyang bya ste /
translated: It is also called the nature of the one taste of all things.

original: dngos po yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dngos po thams cad de /
analyzed: dngos po yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dngos po thams cad de /
translated: It is all things because it is a thing and it is all.

original: de rnams la ro gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de rnams la ro gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of the one taste of those is the nature of the one aspect.

original: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can //
translated: It has the characteristic of emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de'i phyir dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las kyang /
analyzed: de'i phyir dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las kyang /
translated: Therefore, the Sandhinirmocana Sutra says:

original: don dam de ni tha dad ma yin te //
analyzed: don dam de ni tha dad ma yin te //
translated: The ultimate is not different,

original: kun du ro gcig mtshan nyid sangs rgyas gsungs //
analyzed: kun du ro gcig mtshan nyid sangs rgyas gsungs //
translated: the Buddha taught that it has the characteristic of the one taste of all.

original: de la gang dag tha dad kun rtog pa //
analyzed: de la gang dag tha dad kun rtog pa //
translated: Those who imagine it to be different

original: de dag nga rgyal gnas pa rmongs pa yin //
analyzed: de dag nga rgyal gnas pa rmongs pa yin //
translated: are ignorant and remain in pride.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said.

original: 'ching ba rnams las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'ching ba rnams las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: From the bonds, etc.

original: brtul zhugs can gyi dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can gyi dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should add, “I go for refuge to the assembly of the senses of the one who is disciplined.”

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol 'gyur zhing //
translated: He is liberated from the bonds.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang gis 'di la 'ching bar gyur pa rnams las yang dag cing phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam pa grol zhing thar par gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang gis 'di la 'ching bar gyur pa rnams las yang dag cing phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam pa grol zhing thar par gyur pa de ni /
translated: By whatever characteristics such as desire, he is bound, from those he is liberated, and he is freed.

original: 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol 'gyur zhing //
translated: He is liberated from the bonds.

original: zhes bya'o // yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan //
translated: He is glorious, created by supreme compassion.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He is glorious.

original: snying rje mchog ni thugs rje chen po ste /
analyzed: snying rje mchog ni thugs rje chen po ste /
translated: Supreme compassion is great compassion.

original: de la dmigs pas bskrun pa'i dpal bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pas bskrun pa'i dpal bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who is endowed with the accumulation of merit and knowledge generated by the observation of that is called a bodhisattva.

original: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /🔽rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na / rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa //
translated: Moreover, what is the distinction?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He has entered the stages of Perfect Joy and so forth.

original: rab tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba ste /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba ste /
translated: Perfect Joy is the bodhisattva stage of Perfect Joy.

original: de nyid la sogs pa ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rab tu dga' sogs so //
analyzed: de nyid la sogs pa ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rab tu dga' sogs so //
translated: That which is stainless and so forth is Perfect Joy and so forth.

original: de rnams la rab tu zhugs pas na /
analyzed: de rnams la rab tu zhugs pas na /
translated: He has entered those,

original: rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa //
analyzed: rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa //
translated: so he is called one who has entered the stages of Perfect Joy and so forth.

original: zhes bya'o // brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la zhugs pa rnams te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la zhugs pa rnams te /
translated: The vow is those who have entered the lower vehicle.

original: de rnams kyi nang na 'di ni phul @194b du byung ba yin pas na brtul zhugs dbang po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang na 'di ni phul @194b du byung ba yin pas na brtul zhugs dbang po'o //
translated: Since he is the best among them, he is the lord of the vow.

original: de rnams kyi tshogs ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa nyid bzung ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi tshogs ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa nyid bzung ste /
translated: The assembly of those is the bodhisattvas.

original: bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni gzhan dag skyob pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni gzhan dag skyob pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the unexcelled yogis, there is no cause for protecting others.

original: da ni smon pa byang chub kyi sems bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsam dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni smon pa byang chub kyi sems bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsam dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the aspiration thought of awakening, [the Bhagavān] declares the thought, etc.

original: sems byang chub tu bskyed par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sems byang chub tu bskyed par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should generate the thought in awakening.

original: khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin //
translated: It thoroughly removes the instinct for all obscurations.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said.

original: sgrib pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na sgrib pa kun te /
analyzed: sgrib pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na sgrib pa kun te /
translated: Since it is an obscuration and it is all, it is all obscurations.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa thams cad do //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa thams cad do //
translated: All obscurations, such as the obscuration of the knowable, etc.

original: de rnams kyi bag chags ni sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags te yid la de dang 'dra ba'i rnam par shes pa skye dpar nus pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bag chags ni sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags te yid la de dang 'dra ba'i rnam par shes pa skye dpar nus pa'o //
translated: The instinct for those is the instinct for all obscurations, the capacity to generate a consciousness in the mindstream that is similar to that.

original: de 'byin pa'i dang tshul gang la yod pa'i sems de ni /
analyzed: de 'byin pa'i dang tshul gang la yod pa'i sems de ni /
translated: The thought that has the method of removing that is

original: sgrib ba kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin //
analyzed: sgrib ba kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin //
translated: the thought that thoroughly removes the instinct for all obscurations.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: It is said.

original: de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should generate that.

original: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is the distinction?

original: lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, adorned with superior aspiration.

original: lhag par mos pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod pa la lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod pa la lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: Superior aspiration is the superior aspiration for the desire for omniscient wisdom.

original: de nyid kyis brgyan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'o //🔽'di'i dgos pa ni g-yeng ba'i sems kyis sam /
analyzed: de nyid kyis brgyan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'o // 'di'i dgos pa ni g-yeng ba'i sems kyis sam /
translated: That mind which is adorned with that itself is adorned with superior aspiration.🔽The purpose of this is that the generation of the Thought of Enlightenment is not by a distracted mind,

original: gzhan gyi ngor byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngor byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: or by a mind which is concerned with others.

original: gzhan du na ye shes mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na ye shes mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Rather, it is by the desire for wisdom.

original: de ji ltar bskyed par bya zhe na /🔽bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pas //
analyzed: de ji ltar bskyed par bya zhe na / bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pas //
translated: How is that generated?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, by the purification of intention and of maturation.

original: de la bsam pa dag pa ni 'gro ba ma lus pa gdon pa'i sems so //
analyzed: de la bsam pa dag pa ni 'gro ba ma lus pa gdon pa'i sems so //
translated: Therein, the purification of intention is the mind to rescue all beings without exception.

original: rnam par smin pa dag ni sems de nyid las phyis kyang phyir mi ldog cing /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dag ni sems de nyid las phyis kyang phyir mi ldog cing /
translated: The purification of maturation is that, from that very mind, there is no turning back later on.

original: de nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba byed pa'i smon pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba byed pa'i smon pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should generate the Thought of Enlightenment, which has the nature of a vow, in order to perform the activity for the sake of living beings.

original: da ni lam gang gis smon lam 'grub par 'gyur pa'i lam de la gnas par bya ba'i phyir /🔽bder gshegs sras bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni lam gang gis smon lam 'grub par 'gyur pa'i lam de la gnas par bya ba'i phyir / bder gshegs sras bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to abide in that path by which the vow will be fulfilled,
[the Bodhisattva] declares, The path of the Sugatas and their sons, and so on.

original: bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i lam gcig pu la gnas par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽de la bde bar gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i lam gcig pu la gnas par bgyi'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro // de la bde bar gshegs pa ni /
translated: The path of the Sugatas and their sons is to be supplied with I will abide in.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so //
translated: Therein, the Sugatas are the Lord Buddhas.

original: de'i sras ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
analyzed: de'i sras ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
translated: Their sons are the Bodhisattvas.

original: sras dang bcas par bzhugs pas na sras bcas so //
analyzed: sras dang bcas par bzhugs pas na sras bcas so //
translated: Since they abide with their sons, they are with sons.

original: de rnams kyi lam gcig pu ni bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i lam gnyis pa med pa gang yin pa de la gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi lam gcig pu ni bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i lam gnyis pa med pa gang yin pa de la gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The path of the Sugatas and their sons is the one path of those who are with sons. I will abide in that which is the second path of the Sugatas and their sons.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul //
analyzed: sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul //
translated: The method of the ten aspects of giving and so forth, the good qualities of virtue.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rnam pa bcu ni sbyin sogs rnam bcu'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rnam pa bcu ni sbyin sogs rnam bcu'o //
translated: The ten aspects of the perfections from giving to wisdom are the ten aspects of giving and so forth.

original: de nyid ni gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral bas na dkar po'i yon tan no //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral bas na dkar po'i yon tan no //
translated: Since they are free from all conceptual thoughts of apprehending and so forth, they are the good qualities of virtue.

original: de nyid ni tshul te rang bzhin gang la yod pa de ni /
analyzed: de nyid ni tshul te rang bzhin gang la yod pa de ni /
translated: That itself is the method, the nature of which is

original: sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul //
analyzed: sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul //
translated: The method of the ten aspects of giving and so forth, the good qualities of virtue.

original: zhes bya'o // lam de la ji ltar gnas par bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // lam de la ji ltar gnas par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one abide in that path?

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos //
translated: With the mind that is the nature of the entirety of the perfect buddhas,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ste ;
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ste ;
translated: The nature of the perfect buddhas is the nature of the perfect buddhas.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the perfect buddhas is the nature of the mandala wheel.

original: de nyid ni ma lus pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni ma lus pa ste /
translated: That itself is the entirety.

original: lhag ma lus pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lam gang yin pa de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'o //
analyzed: lhag ma lus pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lam gang yin pa de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'o //
translated: That path whose nature is the absence of remainder is the nature of the perfect Buddha, without remainder.

original: de'i blo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bus gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i blo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bus gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: His mind should be placed in the mandala circle.

original: da ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems bstan par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems bstan par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the engaged bodhicitta, [the Bhagavān] declares compassion, etc.

original: snying rjes 'jig rten ma lus pa la dmigs nas byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgoms nas sngags pas sngags la lhag par dbang du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: snying rjes 'jig rten ma lus pa la dmigs nas byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgoms nas sngags pas sngags la lhag par dbang du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having observed the entire world with compassion, having cultivated the sameness of the mind of enlightenment, the mantrin becomes empowered in the mantra.

original: sangs rgyas nyis bsgrub pa la ni snying rje gtso bo nyid du bstan pa dang yang de rgyu nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyis bsgrub pa la ni snying rje gtso bo nyid du bstan pa dang yang de rgyu nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that compassion is foremost in the attainment of Buddhahood, and also in order to teach it as the cause,

original: snying rjes zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: snying rjes zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares compassion.

original: 'jig rten 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems snang ba tsam du @195b zad pa'i phyir rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems snang ba tsam du @195b zad pa'i phyir rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyur pa ste /
translated: This world is the direct experience of self-awareness, because it is just the appearance of one’s own mind.

original: de yang gang 'jig rten zhes brtags pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang gang 'jig rten zhes brtags pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, what is imagined as the world is naturally luminous.

original: 'jig rten thams cad rang gi sems de nyid de ltar snang ba las logs shig na med mod kyi /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad rang gi sems de nyid de ltar snang ba las logs shig na med mod kyi /
translated: The entire world is just one’s own mind appearing in that way.

original: de ltar na yang bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa'i lta ba'i dra ba drug cu rtsa bzhis bcings pas /
analyzed: de ltar na yang bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa'i lta ba'i dra ba drug cu rtsa bzhis bcings pas /
translated: Nevertheless, beings are bound by the sixty-two views of “I” and “mine” and so forth.

original: nya dang bya la sogs pa bzhin du 'gro ba rnams ni rang dbang med pa'i tshul can yin te /
analyzed: nya dang bya la sogs pa bzhin du 'gro ba rnams ni rang dbang med pa'i tshul can yin te /
translated: Like fish and birds, they are not in control.

original: de bas na de rnams la snying rje 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na de rnams la snying rje 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, compassion engages them.

original: yang na snying rje ste thugs rje chen pos khams gsum par gtogs pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag ma lus pa ni lta ba'i dra bas bcings la zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yang na snying rje ste thugs rje chen pos khams gsum par gtogs pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag ma lus pa ni lta ba'i dra bas bcings la zhes bya ste /
translated: Alternatively, this world belonging to the three realms is bound by the net of views, because of great compassion.

original: lta ba nyid ni dra ba yin pas na lta ba'i dra ba ste /
analyzed: lta ba nyid ni dra ba yin pas na lta ba'i dra ba ste /
translated: The net is the view, therefore it is the net of views.

original: bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i blo'o //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i blo'o //
translated: It is the mind that is the conception of self, mine, etc.

original: des bcings pa ni bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: des bcings pa ni bsdams pa'o //
translated: One is bound by it, i.e., one is fettered by it.

original: yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa //
analyzed: yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa //
translated: The thought of enlightenment is unexcelled.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This refers to the thought of entering enlightenment.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems ni yang dag byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems ni yang dag byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The thought which has the nature of perfect enlightenment, as will be explained below, is the thought of enlightenment.

original: de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa'o //
translated: It is unexcelled because it is not common to all sravakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: sngags pas cho ga 'dis ni bsdom par bya //
analyzed: sngags pas cho ga 'dis ni bsdom par bya //
translated: The mantrin should be bound by this rite.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means:

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa'i cho ga gang yin pas byang chub kyi sems rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa'i cho ga gang yin pas byang chub kyi sems rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: By whatever rite, as will be explained below, one should cultivate the thought of enlightenment.

original: cho ga de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: cho ga de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just that rite, he declares, “The nature of emptiness,” and so on.🔽“The nature of emptiness” is to be supplied with “all things are emptiness.”

original: dngos po ma lus pa ni stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar sbyar te stong pa nyid ni gnyis su me dpa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po ma lus pa ni stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar sbyar te stong pa nyid ni gnyis su me dpa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: “Emptiness” is the nature of the nondual intuition.

original: stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ci'i phyir stong pa zhe bya zhe na /
analyzed: stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ci'i phyir stong pa zhe bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called “emptiness”?

original: ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He declares, “Because of the absence of intrinsic reality.”

original: byis pa rnams kyis brtags pa'i gzugs ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par bral ba yin gyi /
analyzed: byis pa rnams kyis brtags pa'i gzugs ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par bral ba yin gyi /
translated: It is free from the mode of the apprehended object and apprehending subject imagined by the naïve.

original: rnam pa thams cad du rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not totally empty of intrinsic reality,

original: gzhan du na dngos po zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //🔽de ltan yan gdon 'dir bya ba la dngos po zhes bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos po zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // de ltan yan gdon 'dir bya ba la dngos po zhes bya'o zhe na /
translated: otherwise it would contradict the statement, “all things are emptiness.”

original: gang zhig rnam pa thams @196a * //
analyzed: gang zhig rnam pa thams @196a * //
translated: If that is so, then here in this mantra, “all things” must refer to entities.

original: cad du med pa de la ni don gyi bya ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cad du med pa de la ni don gyi bya ba 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But if something is totally nonexistent, then it cannot perform any function.

original: de bzhin rgyu dang bral bas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu dang bral ba yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyu dang bral bas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu dang bral ba yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, it is free from a cause means that it is free from a cause imagined by others, such as Īśvara, but it is not free from its own characteristic.

original: yang na rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
analyzed: yang na rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
translated: Or else, it is the valid knowledge of reflexive awareness alone.

original: rgyu rgyur med par gyur pa ni mi gzung ste /
analyzed: rgyu rgyur med par gyur pa ni mi gzung ste /
translated: It is not that it becomes free from a cause,

original: yod pa ma yin pa dag kyang rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa dag kyang rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because nonexistents are also free from a cause.

original: yang na rgyu dang bral bas de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa yang yin te /
analyzed: yang na rgyu dang bral bas de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa yang yin te /
translated: Or else, it is free from a cause, and likewise it is also signless.

original: rgyu ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu ni gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa ste /
translated: The cause is imagined by others,

original: de'i rgyu dang dbang phyug la sogs pa dang bral zhing med pas dngos po rnams mtshan ma med pa ste mtshan ma yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu dang dbang phyug la sogs pa dang bral zhing med pas dngos po rnams mtshan ma med pa ste mtshan ma yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: and since it is free from that cause, such as Īśvara, things are signless, that is, they do not exist as signs.

original: rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir smon pa las nges par grol ba'o zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir smon pa las nges par grol ba'o zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: It is free from the wish that is to say, free from the conception that is the imagination.

original: rtog pa ni brtags pa ste /
analyzed: rtog pa ni brtags pa ste /
translated: The conception is the imagination.

original: 'di ni lha'i 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ni lha'i 'gro ba'am /
translated: This is the destiny of a god,

original: klu'i 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: klu'i 'gro ba'am /
translated: or the destiny of a nāga,

original: 'dir ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dir ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur //
translated: or here one will experience suffering and happiness.

original: zhes bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i rtog pa rnams dang bral zhing med pas smon pa las nges par grol ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i rtog pa rnams dang bral zhing med pas smon pa las nges par grol ba ste /
translated: Since such conceptual thoughts are absent, one is liberated from aspiration.

original: 'gro ba de dang der gzugs dang longs spyod dang dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i rnam pa ni smon pa yin la /
analyzed: 'gro ba de dang der gzugs dang longs spyod dang dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i rnam pa ni smon pa yin la /
translated: Aspirations are the aspects of desire for form, enjoyment, power, and so on in this and that destiny.

original: de las nges par grol ba ni bral ba ste /
analyzed: de las nges par grol ba ni bral ba ste /
translated: Liberation from that is freedom.

original: bden pa'i dngos po la brtag par bya ba yin na bden pa'i dngos po de'i rtog pa dang bral bas stong pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i dngos po la brtag par bya ba yin na bden pa'i dngos po de'i rtog pa dang bral bas stong pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: If it is to be investigated as a real thing, since it is free from the conceptual thought of that real thing, it should be seen as emptiness.🔽Or,

original: yang na // rtog pa rnams dang bral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: yang na // rtog pa rnams dang bral ba'i phyir //
translated: because it is free from conceptual thoughts,

original: zhes bya ba ni smon pa po dang smon lam dang / smon par bya ba 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i rtog pa dang bral bas rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni smon pa po dang smon lam dang / smon par bya ba 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i rtog pa dang bral bas rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: it is non-conceptual, since it is free from the conceptual thought of an aspirer, an aspiration, and an object of aspiration such as this.

original: smon pa zhes bya ba ni rdzas kyi bye brag tsam du zad kyi don dam par ni stong pa nyid kho na'i nang du 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: smon pa zhes bya ba ni rdzas kyi bye brag tsam du zad kyi don dam par ni stong pa nyid kho na'i nang du 'dus pa yin no //
translated: Aspiration is just a particular substance, but ultimately it is included in emptiness alone.

original: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa 'di brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa 'di brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni /
translated: The consecration with a mantra in order to stabilize this cultivation of the thought of awakening is stated as:

original: aom shr'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /🔽zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: aom shr'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham / zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako 'ham

original: aom zhes bya ba ni thog mar gyur pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dpal dang ldan pa ni yi ge aom ste /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba ni thog mar gyur pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dpal dang ldan pa ni yi ge aom ste /
translated: Oṃ is the beginning, fearless, and endowed with glory, which is the syllable oṃ.

original: aom zhes bya ba ni khas len pa ste /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba ni khas len pa ste /
translated: Oṃ is the promise,

original: stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid do //
translated: emptiness.

original: @196b de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //🔽de nyid ni rang bzhin te /
analyzed: @196b de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o // de nyid ni rang bzhin te /
translated: That itself is indivisible, so it is a vajra.🔽That itself is the nature,

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin gyi /
translated: and that essence is the self.

original: stong pa nyid ni gzhan ma yin la stong pa nyid las kyang bdag gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni gzhan ma yin la stong pa nyid las kyang bdag gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is not other than that, and the self is not other than emptiness.

original: de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: After that, etc.

original: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs la /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs la /
translated: means immediately after the consecration of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bsgom par bya'o zhes par sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bsgom par bya'o zhes par sbyar ro //
translated: One should meditate on the seal called the source of phenomena.

original: gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang du bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: Where should one meditate?

original: 'di rje btsun gyis bcu gcig pa las bshad pas h'um gis rdo rjer byas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje phra rab kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can nam /
analyzed: 'di rje btsun gyis bcu gcig pa las bshad pas h'um gis rdo rjer byas pa zhes bya ba gsungs te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje phra rab kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can nam /
translated: The venerable one explains this in the eleventh chapter, saying, “Having made it a vajra with HŪṀ,” which means that the syllable HŪṀ located on a sun maṇḍala transforms into the nature of a vajra particle,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: or the nature of a crossed vajra.🔽“Arisen from Samantabhadra” indicates the syllable HŪṀ located in the protection wheel, which transforms into a vajra.

original: kun du bzang las byung bar zhes bya ba ni srung ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i zhes bya bas ni srung ba'i 'khor lo nye bar ston te bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kun du bzang las byung bar zhes bya ba ni srung ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i zhes bya bas ni srung ba'i 'khor lo nye bar ston te bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: “Having made it a vajra with HŪṀ” indicates the protection wheel, which is for the purpose of warding off demons, obstructors, and so forth.

original: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyis gzhi bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyis gzhi bsam par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should imagine the ground to be of the nature of a vajra, from the syllable hūṃ located in the orb of the sun.

original: phra rab re re'i mthar sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya la /
analyzed: phra rab re re'i mthar sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya la /
translated: One should meditate on the form of a vajra cross at the end of each atom.

original: de'i ngos kyi 'od zer rnams las ngos bzhir rdo rje'i ra ba dang steng gi 'od zer rnams las rdo rje'i bla re bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ngos kyi 'od zer rnams las ngos bzhir rdo rje'i ra ba dang steng gi 'od zer rnams las rdo rje'i bla re bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the light rays from the sides of that to be a vajra fence on the four sides, and the light rays above to be a vajra canopy.

original: de lta na yang gal te rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i stobs kyis bgegs kyi dogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de lta na yang gal te rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i stobs kyis bgegs kyi dogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur na /
translated: Even so, if the fear of obstacles arises through the power of one’s concepts,

original: de'i tshe rdo rje bla re'i phyi rol du lam las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa mtshams bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa kha dog ser po bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe rdo rje bla re'i phyi rol du lam las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa mtshams bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa kha dog ser po bsam par bya'o //
translated: then, outside the vajra canopy, one should imagine a square maṇḍala of the great lords from the syllable laṃ, marked with three-tined vajras in the four directions, yellow in color.

original: de'i phyi rol du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa sngon po bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa sngon po bsam par bya'o //
translated: Outside of that, one should imagine a wind maṇḍala in the shape of a bow from the syllable yaṃ, marked with pennants, blue in color.

original: de'i phyi rol du ram las byung ba me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'bar ba 'phro bar snang ba bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du ram las byung ba me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'bar ba 'phro bar snang ba bsam par bya ste /
translated: Outside of that, one should imagine a triangular fire mandala arisen from RAM, blazing and radiating light.

original: 'di ni spyi'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'di ni spyi'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: This is the general protection wheel.

original: h'um gis rdo rjer byas pa'i sar //
analyzed: h'um gis rdo rjer byas pa'i sar //
translated: The ground is made of vajras by HUM.

original: zhes bya ba ni bgegs ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i yi ge h'um las sa gzhi rdo rjer byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bgegs ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i yi ge h'um las sa gzhi rdo rjer byas pa'o //
translated: The ground is made of vajras by the syllable HUM, which is the cause for the complete pacification of all obstructors.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is its special feature?

original: kun du bzang las byung @197a * //

translated: Since it is taught extensively to beings, it pervades.

analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid du byas pa'i rgyu des na rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dang yi phreng ba dang / dril bu sgra sgrogs pas phyogs kun khyab pa yin no //
translated: Because of the cause of making that its essence, it is the garland of flags moved by the wind and the sound of the proclamation of the bells that pervades all directions.

original: me long dra ba dran phyed me tog gi //
analyzed: me long dra ba dran phyed me tog gi //
translated: The garland of flags is the mirror, and the bells are the flowers.

original: phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa med //
analyzed: phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa med //
translated: Adorned with various garlands, incomparable.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: In this verse,

original: me long dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / me tog dang me tog gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis brgyan pas na /
analyzed: me long dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / me tog dang me tog gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis brgyan pas na /
translated: adorned with various mirrors, nets, half-nets, flowers, and flower garlands,

original: me long dra ba dra phyed me tog gi / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan zhes bya ste /
analyzed: me long dra ba dra phyed me tog gi / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan zhes bya ste /
translated: he is said to be adorned with various mirrors, nets, half-nets, flower garlands.

original: de rnams kyi mnyam pa med pa ni zla med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mnyam pa med pa ni zla med pa ste /
translated: His incomparability is his uniqueness.

original: mtshungs pa'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no equal reflection.

original: de'i phyir de 'di lta bur gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de 'di lta bur gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is he like that?

original: ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi //🔽yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi // yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs //
translated: The mirror of stainless intuition, the fragrance of enlightenment,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the flower of the fulfillment of all wishes.

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa nyid las /
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa nyid las /
translated: From the mirror-like intuition and so on,

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni me long ste /
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni me long ste /
translated: the mirror-like intuition is the mirror.

original: de ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid du chos thams cad ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid du chos thams cad ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it shows all things in the nature of reflections.

original: rtag tu dri ma med pa yang yin la /
analyzed: rtag tu dri ma med pa yang yin la /
translated: It is always stainless,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin pas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin pas /
translated: and it is a branch of enlightenment.

original: dri med byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ste /
analyzed: dri med byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called the stainless branch of enlightenment.

original: de nyid dri dang ldan pa'i me tog rnams so //
analyzed: de nyid dri dang ldan pa'i me tog rnams so //
translated: Those are the flowers with fragrance.

original: de ltar na ye shes kyi me long dang / rtag tu dri ma med pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi @199a * //
analyzed: de ltar na ye shes kyi me long dang / rtag tu dri ma med pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi @199a * //
translated: Thus, the mirror of wisdom and the stainless branch of enlightenment

original: me tog ni /
analyzed: me tog ni /
translated: are the flowers.

original: ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi //🔽yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi // yan lag dri ni me tog phun sum tshogs //
translated: The stainless mirror of wisdom

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: is the perfect flower of the branch of enlightenment.

original: de rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i de rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i de rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa ste /
translated: The perfection of those is the cause of those.

original: rgyu des na dra ba la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu des na dra ba la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags par blta bar bya'o //
translated: By that cause, the distinctions of the net, etc., should be seen as distinguished.

original: ka ba bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ka ba bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa // zhes bya ba la /

original: ka ba brgyad ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i ka ba ste /
analyzed: ka ba brgyad ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i ka ba ste /
translated: The eight pillars are the pillars of the wheel, etc.

original: de rnams kyis mdzes pa ni brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis mdzes pa ni brgyan pa'o //
translated: Adorned by those is the ornament.

original: bzang po ni grags pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni grags pa thob pa'o //
translated: The good is the attainment of fame.

original: de gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: rnam thar brgyad po rnam par dag pa yin // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is the purity of the eight liberations.🔽The eight liberations are:
