analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni rnam par thar ba dang po'o //
translated: The first liberation is the perception of form by one who has the form realm.

original: zhes bya ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the absorption of cessation.

original: de nyid rnam par dag pas de 'dra ba yin par blta bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag ldan pa ni //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par dag pas de 'dra ba yin par blta bar bya'o // rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag ldan pa ni //
translated: It should be seen as such by the purity of that.🔽It is endowed with the vajra lines.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
translated: It is surrounded by the vajra garland.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rdo rje theg chos 'khor lo rab bskor ba'o //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje theg chos 'khor lo rab bskor ba'o // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is the turning of the wheel of the vajra vehicle.

original: rdo rje theg pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa ste /
translated: The vajra vehicle is the vehicle of mantra.

original: des chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it turns the wheel of Dharma.

original: gzugs sogs yul rnams zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs sogs yul rnams zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'o //
translated: The objects such as form are form, sound, and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Their purity is freedom from the grasped and the grasper.🔽Therefore,

original: des na / bla med mtha' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
analyzed: des na / bla med mtha' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
translated: the five sense objects, unsurpassed and infinite,🔽are the five sense objects of form, sound, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la bla na med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi dang tshul can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bla na med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi dang tshul can no //
translated: Unsurpassed means endowed with the mode of nondual intuition.

original: mtha' yas pa ni tshad med pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa ni tshad med pa ste /
translated: Infinite means immeasurable.

original: de lta bu'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gzhal yas khang brtsegs ma gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gzhal yas khang brtsegs ma gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The five sense objects of that kind are the five sense objects of form, sound, etc.

original: mchod pa lnga ni me tog dang bdug spos dang mar me dang byug pa dang lha bshos kyi tshul te /
analyzed: mchod pa lnga ni me tog dang bdug spos dang mar me dang byug pa dang lha bshos kyi tshul te /
translated: The five offerings are in the manner of flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, and food.

original: de rnams kyis brgyan pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyis brgyan pa yang yin no //
translated: The palace is adorned with those.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: Their purity is

original: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun yin //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun yin //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the natural outcome of the purity of the realm of truth.

original: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa'i rnam par dag pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa @199b rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul can te /
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa'i rnam par dag pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa @199b rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul can te /
translated: The purity adorned with the five offerings is the cause of the pure realm of the holy Dharma, having the mode of nondual pristine awareness.

original: dam pa'i chos ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa'o //
translated: The holy Dharma is the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi dbyings ni rigs yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbyings ni rigs yin te /
translated: The realm of those is the family,

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems so //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems so //
translated: which is the mind having the nature of wisdom and method.

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa ni 'bras bur gyur pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa ni 'bras bur gyur pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The cause of that is the result, is the meaning of the words.

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With respect to the various lotus petals,

original: sna tshogs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yang yin la /
translated: they are various and

original: padma'i 'dab ma yang yin pas na sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma ste /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma yang yin pas na sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma ste /
translated: they are lotus petals, thus they are various lotus petals.

original: de rnams la nyi ma dang zla ba ci rigs par legs par gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams la nyi ma dang zla ba ci rigs par legs par gnas pa ni /
translated: The sun and moon are well situated on those, as is appropriate.

original: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab mar legs gnas par //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab mar legs gnas par //
translated: Well situated on various lotus petals

original: nyi zla zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyi zla zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is the sun and moon.

original: de rnams kyi mgon dang bcas pa ni gang du lha rnams kyi bzhugs gnas dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang brtsegs ma gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mgon dang bcas pa ni gang du lha rnams kyi bzhugs gnas dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang brtsegs ma gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is called “together with their lords” is the mansion of the gods together with the abode of the gods.

original: dbus dang shar gyi gnas su ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbus dang shar gyi gnas su ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the middle and eastern places, one should see them together with their lords, abiding on moon seats on the petals of variegated lotuses.

original: lho la sogs pa'i gnas gsum du ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //🔽spyan la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi gnas su ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la /
analyzed: lho la sogs pa'i gnas gsum du ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o // spyan la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi gnas su ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la /
translated: In the three places beginning with the south, one should see them together with their lords, abiding on sun seats on the petals of variegated lotuses.

original: zla ba legs par gnas pa'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba legs par gnas pa'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the places of the goddesses beginning with Locanā and beginning with Form, one should see them together with their lords, abiding on well-placed moon seats on the petals of variegated lotuses.

original: khro bo rnams kyi ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams kyi ni sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la nyi ma'i mgon dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the places of the wrathful ones, one should see them together with their lords, abiding on sun seats on the petals of variegated lotuses.

original: rin chen ma lus pa yis rnam spras pa //
analyzed: rin chen ma lus pa yis rnam spras pa //
translated: Adorned with all the jewels,

original: zhes bya ba la rin chen ma lus pa ni aindra n'i la la sogs pa ste rin po che de dag gis rnam par spras pa ni de las bsgrubs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rin chen ma lus pa ni aindra n'i la la sogs pa ste rin po che de dag gis rnam par spras pa ni de las bsgrubs pa yin te /
translated: In this verse, the “entire jewel” is the sapphire, etc., and the “seal of the source of phenomena” is the source of phenomena, which is made of those jewels.

original: de lta bu'i chos 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya der rab tu bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya der rab tu bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should accomplish that seal of the source of phenomena there, in the source of phenomena.

original: bcu drug cha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bcu drug cha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The “sixteen parts” and so forth.

original: dbus ma'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbus ma'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should imagine the full moon mandala in the center of the mandala seat.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is its special feature?

original: bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said to be “arisen from the collection of sixteen parts.”

original: bcu drug cha ni aa la sogs pa'o //🔽tshogs ni k'a @200a * //
analyzed: bcu drug cha ni aa la sogs pa'o // tshogs ni k'a @200a * //
translated: The “sixteen parts” are the vowels a, etc.

original: la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: la sogs pa ste /
translated: The “collection” is the consonants ka, etc.

original: bcu drug cha dang tshogs ni bcu drug cha dang tshogs te /
analyzed: bcu drug cha dang tshogs ni bcu drug cha dang tshogs te /
translated: The “sixteen parts and the collection” are the sixteen parts and the collection.

original: de rnams las byung zhing skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba'i zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams las byung zhing skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba'i zhes bya'o //
translated: That which arises and is born from those is called “arisen from the collection of sixteen parts. ”

original: 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs ldan pa //
analyzed: 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs ldan pa //
translated: Possessing a mass of immeasurable light rays,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: here,

original: 'od zer ni 'od kyi zer du 'phros pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: 'od zer ni 'od kyi zer du 'phros pa'i tshogs so //
translated: light rays are a mass of light rays that radiate out.

original: dpag tu med pa ni tshad med pa ste /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa ni tshad med pa ste /
translated: Immeasurable is immeasurable.

original: 'od kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That mass of light rays is called that.

original: de ji ltar bsam zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar bsam zhe na /
translated: How is that imagined?

original: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “according to the rite. ”

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the thirty-two marks of a great being are purified, and the eighty minor marks are purified.

original: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa 'dir rdo rje bzang po bsams la /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa 'dir rdo rje bzang po bsams la /
translated: The glorious Supreme Original, etc. , is this second moon disk, imagining a good vajra here.

original: de'i nga rgyal dan ldan par gyur par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro//
analyzed: de'i nga rgyal dan ldan par gyur par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro//
translated: One should be possessed of the pride of that, it is to be applied.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the special feature?🔽It is said:

original: dpal mchog dang po'i ngo bo snying po las byung ba //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i ngo bo snying po las byung ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Arisen from the essence of the glorious Supreme Original Buddha.

original: dpal mchog dang po ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The glorious Supreme Original Buddha is the Blessed One, the glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ste /
analyzed: de'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ste /
translated: His essence is the syllable hum.

original: de las yang dag par byung bas na /
analyzed: de las yang dag par byung bas na /
translated: Since it arises from that,

original: dpal mchog dang po'i snying po las byung ba'i zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i snying po las byung ba'i zhes bya'o //
translated: it is said to be arisen from the essence of the glorious Supreme Original Buddha.🔽It is like a red jewel.

original: nor bu dmar 'dra la zhes bya ba ni rin po che dmar po ste /🔽de nyid dang 'dra zhing gzugs brnyan du gyur pa gang yin pa der gyur pa ni nor bu dmar 'dra la zhes bya ste /
analyzed: nor bu dmar 'dra la zhes bya ba ni rin po che dmar po ste / de nyid dang 'dra zhing gzugs brnyan du gyur pa gang yin pa der gyur pa ni nor bu dmar 'dra la zhes bya ste /
translated: It is like a red jewel, a red gem.

original: padma r'a ga 'dra ba zhes bya pa'i don to //
analyzed: padma r'a ga 'dra ba zhes bya pa'i don to //
translated: It is like a ruby.

original: de nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach its special feature,🔽it is said:

original: dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The assembly of light rays of immeasurable sages.

original: dpag tu med pa yang yin la /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa yang yin la /
translated: It is immeasurable and

original: thub pa'i dbang po yang yin pas na dpag med thub pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa'i dbang po yang yin pas na dpag med thub pa'o //
translated: and since he is also the Lord of Sages, he is the immeasurable sage.

original: dpag tu med pa'i thub pa de rnams kyi 'od kyi tshogs rnam par 'phro bas na /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'i thub pa de rnams kyi 'od kyi tshogs rnam par 'phro bas na /
translated: Since the mass of light of those immeasurable sages radiates,

original: dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs rnams 'phro ba //🔽zhes bya ste /
analyzed: dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs rnams 'phro ba // zhes bya ste /
translated: he is the radiating mass of light of immeasurable sages.

original: de rnams kyi phyogs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa khyab par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi phyogs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa khyab par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Since he pervades the infinite directions with those, he is so called.

original: phyogs kyi sgo kun nas thams cad du 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i rdo rje bzang po bsam pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgo kun nas thams cad du 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i rdo rje bzang po bsam pa'o //
translated: One should imagine that excellent vajra in all directions, everywhere, in that way.

original: @200b dang po'i snying po mgon bcas bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: @200b dang po'i snying po mgon bcas bsgoms nas ni //
translated: Having meditated on the essence of the first with the protector,

original: zhes bya ba ni dang po'i snying po zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yi ge h'um gi mgon dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dang po'i snying po zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yi ge h'um gi mgon dang bcas pa'o //
translated: the essence of the first is the essence of Vajrasattva, the syllable hum, with the protector.

original: nga rgyal don ldan zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' de'i nga rgyal ni nga rgyal ste /
analyzed: nga rgyal don ldan zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' de'i nga rgyal ni nga rgyal ste /
translated: Having the pride of the meaning is the pride of that Vajrasattva, the pride.

original: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Om vajra-atmako ham.

original: zhes bya ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has this nature is a yogin.

original: mtha' yas pa'i sprul pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas nas rgyal ba skyed pa byed pa nyid kyi sku ru bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i sprul pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas nas rgyal ba skyed pa byed pa nyid kyi sku ru bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having performed the aims of the highest beings through infinite emanations, one should imagine the body of the Victorious One as the producer.

original: de la mtha' yas pa yang yin la sprul pa yang yin pas na mtha' yas sprul pa ste /
analyzed: de la mtha' yas pa yang yin la sprul pa yang yin pas na mtha' yas sprul pa ste /
translated: Here, since they are infinite and emanations, they are infinite emanations.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa de lta bu de rnams kyis 'gro ba mchog gi don rnam byas shing bsgrubs par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa de lta bu de rnams kyis 'gro ba mchog gi don rnam byas shing bsgrubs par gyur pa ste /
translated: Those such yoginīs perform and accomplish the aims of the highest beings.

original: gang gis yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'di dag gyur pa ni 'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas gyur cing /🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gis yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'di dag gyur pa ni 'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas gyur cing / zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Having become those who have the characteristic of perfect enlightenment, they perform the aims of the highest beings.🔽Having performed the aims of the highest beings,

original: rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: they are yoginīs.

original: rgyal ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyi sku ji ltar bsam par bya zhe na /
analyzed: rgyal ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyi sku ji ltar bsam par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one imagine the body of the Victorious One as the producer?

original: thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs mtshungs med pa //
analyzed: thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs mtshungs med pa //
translated: The incomparable one, produced from the atoms of the Supreme Sage.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: thub pa mchog nyid kyi phra rab ni thub mchog phra rab ste /
analyzed: thub pa mchog nyid kyi phra rab ni thub mchog phra rab ste /
translated: The atoms of the Supreme Sage are the atoms of the Supreme Sage.

original: de las bsgrubs pa ni skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de las bsgrubs pa ni skyed pa'o //
translated: Produced from them is produced from the atoms of the Supreme Sage.

original: de yang so so skye bo rnams kyi lus ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i phra rab las yongs su bsgrubs pa yin par grags la /
analyzed: de yang so so skye bo rnams kyi lus ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i phra rab las yongs su bsgrubs pa yin par grags la /
translated: Moreover, it is well known that the bodies of ordinary beings are completely produced from the atoms of the four great elements.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni thub pa mchog gi rang bzhin gyi phra rab las rnam par bsgrubs pa yin pas na 'di ni thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni thub pa mchog gi rang bzhin gyi phra rab las rnam par bsgrubs pa yin pas na 'di ni thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: But the body of the Blessed One is produced from the atoms of the nature of the Supreme Sage. Therefore, this is produced from the atoms of the Supreme Sage.

original: mtshungs pa med pa ni mnyam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa ni mnyam pa med pa'o //
translated: Incomparable means unequaled.

original: gzhan yang de'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, in order to teach its distinctions,

analyzed: zla ba rgyas 'drar dkar pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Like the full moon, with the radiance of white light,” and so on.🔽That which has the radiance of white light, like the full moon,

original: zla ba gang ba bzhin du dkar ba'i 'od kyi mdangs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: zla ba gang ba bzhin du dkar ba'i 'od kyi mdangs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: is the one who is

analyzed: zla ba rgyas 'drar dkar ba'i ma dangs ldan zhing // zhes bya'o // gang gi g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal sngo ba dang dmar pa mnga' ba de ni /
translated: He has a radiance white like the full moon.🔽He who has a blue and red face on the right and left

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo dang dmar //🔽zhes bya ste /
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo dang dmar // zhes bya ste /
translated: has a blue and red face on the right and left.

original: zhal dbus ma zla ba rgyas pa dang 'dra @201a * //
analyzed: zhal dbus ma zla ba rgyas pa dang 'dra @201a * //
translated: The central face has a radiance white like the full moon.🔽The right and left faces are blue and red.

original: bar dkar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yin la g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo dang dmar ba yin pas de skad ces bya'o zhes mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bar dkar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yin la g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo dang dmar ba yin pas de skad ces bya'o zhes mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: He is called that because he has a radiance white like the full moon.

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /🔽sna tshogs pa'i rgyan te gdu bu la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams phyag gnyis po gang 'bar bar gyur ba de ni /
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la / sna tshogs pa'i rgyan te gdu bu la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams phyag gnyis po gang 'bar bar gyur ba de ni /
translated: The verse reads:🔽He has a variety of ornaments blazing on his two hands.

original: sna tshogs rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis kyis //🔽zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis kyis // zhes bya ste /
translated: He has a variety of ornaments blazing on his two hands.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams 'bar ba yang yin la phyag gnyis kyang yin pas /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams 'bar ba yang yin la phyag gnyis kyang yin pas /
translated: He has a variety of ornaments blazing on his two hands.

original: sna tshogs rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis kyis//
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis kyis//
translated: With blazing hands adorned with various ornaments.

original: zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ste /
translated: This is what is said.

original: des rig pa dam pa 'khyud par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des rig pa dam pa 'khyud par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he embraces the sublime awareness.

original: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is the distinction?

original: lhag ma'i phyag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lhag ma'i phyag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He is called “holding a vajra, sword, lotus, and jewel in his remaining hands.”

original: de las lhag ma'i phyag ste /
analyzed: de las lhag ma'i phyag ste /
translated: His remaining hands are the ones other than those.

original: de dag gi lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang ; ral gri dang / rin po che dang / padma dag bsnams par mdzad pa dag gang yin pa de ni lhag ma'i phyag gis rdo rje ral gri dang padma rin chen bsnams pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang ; ral gri dang / rin po che dang / padma dag bsnams par mdzad pa dag gang yin pa de ni lhag ma'i phyag gis rdo rje ral gri dang padma rin chen bsnams pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he holds a vajra, sword, lotus, and jewel in those remaining hands.

original: zung gnyis mdzes zhes bya ba ni phyag lhag ma zung gnyis po dag na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / padma dang / nor bu bsnams pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zung gnyis mdzes zhes bya ba ni phyag lhag ma zung gnyis po dag na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / padma dang / nor bu bsnams pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Beautiful with two pairs” means that he is beautiful with two pairs of remaining hands holding a vajra, sword, lotus, and jewel. This is the meaning.

original: gzhan yang de dag gi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang de dag gi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, in order to teach their distinction,

original: khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The three realms, etc.

original: khams gsum gyi khongs ni khams gsum gyi nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi khongs ni khams gsum gyi nam mkha' ste /
translated: The space of the three realms is the realm of the three realms.

original: de rnam par brgyan pas na khams gsum khongs ni rnam par brgyan pa'i zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnam par brgyan pas na khams gsum khongs ni rnam par brgyan pa'i zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it is adorned, it is called the “adornment of the space of the three realms.”

original: thub pa'i 'od tshogs ni thub pa'i 'od zer te de rnams kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: thub pa'i 'od tshogs ni thub pa'i 'od zer te de rnams kyi tshogs so //
translated: The mass of light of the Sage is the light rays of the Sage.

original: du ma ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: du ma ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: Many means various.

original: de rnam par 'gyed bas na /
analyzed: de rnam par 'gyed bas na /
translated: Since it is distributed,

original: thub pa'i 'od tshogs du ma rnam par 'gyed //
analyzed: thub pa'i 'od tshogs du ma rnam par 'gyed //
translated: it is called the “distribution of the many lights of the Sage.”

original: ces bya'o // rnam par thar pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ni stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya'o // rnam par thar pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ni stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The three doors of liberation, etc. The three doors of liberation are the characteristics of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: de nyid ni rnam par dag pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid ni rnam par dag pa yin la /
translated: That itself is purity.

original: des shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: des shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can te /
translated: It is the essence of wisdom and method.

analyzed: shes rab dang thabs gnyis su @201b med pa'i mtshan nyid can de'i bdag tu bsam mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should think of that as the nature of the one who has the characteristic of nondual wisdom and method.

original: snying rje mchog ni thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de la snying rje mchog ces bshad do //🔽de ni ma lus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni gcig tu de kho na nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can no zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: snying rje mchog ni thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de la snying rje mchog ces bshad do // de ni ma lus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni gcig tu de kho na nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can no zhes bya bas ni /
translated: The supreme compassion is that which has the characteristic of great compassion, and that is explained as “supreme compassion.”

original: ma lus 'gro ba'i de nyid gcig pu nyid //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba'i de nyid gcig pu nyid //
translated: That is the sole reality of all of this world, which has the characteristic of nondual wisdom.

original: ces bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ste /
translated: Thus, it is said:🔽The sole reality of all of this world.

original: de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed pa po yin pas /
analyzed: de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed pa po yin pas /
translated: That is the producer of the victors,

original: rgyal ba skyed byed de bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba skyed byed de bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: and therefore it is the Victor-producer, the Blessed One Vajradhara.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Blessed One has the nature of nondual wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi sku ni rang gi ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi sku ni rang gi ngo bo nyid de /
translated: His body is his own nature.

original: de bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should think of that.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽mchog tu rjes chags zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / mchog tu rjes chags zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme passion, etc.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba ste /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba ste /

original: de'i phun sum tshogs pa yin la ;
analyzed: de'i phun sum tshogs pa yin la ;
translated: That is the perfection,

original: des gdul bya'i 'jig rten thams cad de /
analyzed: des gdul bya'i 'jig rten thams cad de /
translated: and by that, all the worlds of those to be tamed,

original: khams gsum par gtogs pa rnams dmigs la /
analyzed: khams gsum par gtogs pa rnams dmigs la /
translated: those belonging to the three realms, are visualized.

analyzed: rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa gzhug par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should cause the entire assembly of victors to enter.

original: dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra yis zhes bya ba la dga' ba ni rab tu dga' ba ste rdo rje padma sgyu ma lta bur so sor snang ba tsam gyi sgra ni dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra ste /
analyzed: dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra yis zhes bya ba la dga' ba ni rab tu dga' ba ste rdo rje padma sgyu ma lta bur so sor snang ba tsam gyi sgra ni dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra ste /
translated: The sound of the illusion of joy is the joy of supreme joy, the sound of the mere individual appearance of the illusion-like vajra and lotus.

original: des nang gi lus kyi dbus su rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa ste /
analyzed: des nang gi lus kyi dbus su rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa ste /
translated: By that, the entire assembly of victors, the entire assembly of victors,

original: lhag ma med par zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma med par zhugs par bya'o //
translated: should be caused to enter without remainder.

original: de ni spyan la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ni spyan la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: That is the eyes, etc.

original: rgyal ba'i tshogs de ni spyan la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis phyung nas /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i tshogs de ni spyan la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis phyung nas /
translated: That assembly of victors is extracted by the nature of Locanā, and so on.

analyzed: rig ma de dag thams cad rang gi rig ma'i nang du chud par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: All those knowledge goddesses are to be placed within one’s own knowledge goddess.

original: de la spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa ma lus pa yul yin na /
analyzed: de la spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa ma lus pa yul yin na /
translated: Therein, Locanā, and so on, and all the goddesses of form, and so on, are the objects.

original: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang gzugs la sogs pa ma lus yul gyis zhes bya ste /
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang gzugs la sogs pa ma lus yul gyis zhes bya ste /
translated: Locanā, and so on, and all the goddesses of form, and so on, are the objects.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis phyung zhing bton nas rig ma thams cad de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis phyung zhing bton nas rig ma thams cad de /
translated: Having extracted and removed their natures, all the knowledge goddesses

original: spyan la sogs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo dgu po rang gi rig ma zhes bya ba /
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo dgu po rang gi rig ma zhes bya ba /
translated: are the nine goddesses of Locanā, and so on, and form, and so on, who are one’s own knowledge goddess.

original: rang gi so sor snang pa'i @202a * //
analyzed: rang gi so sor snang pa'i @202a * //
translated: One’s own individual

original: rig ma de'i nang du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: rig ma de'i nang du chud par bya'o //
translated: knowledge goddess is to be placed within that knowledge goddess.

original: de'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽de'i padma ni de nyid kyi padma'o /
analyzed: de'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / de'i padma ni de nyid kyi padma'o /
translated: In the lotus of that, and so on,🔽the lotus of that is the lotus of that.

original: de'i lte ba ni dbus kyi lte ba ste /
analyzed: de'i lte ba ni dbus kyi lte ba ste /
translated: The center of that is the center of that.

original: de'i nang du zhes bya ba dbus su dkyil 'khor bsams nas 'gro ba'i tshogs der gzhug par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i nang du zhes bya ba dbus su dkyil 'khor bsams nas 'gro ba'i tshogs der gzhug par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having visualized the mandala in the middle of that, one should introduce the assembly of beings there.

original: dkyil 'khor khyad par can ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor khyad par can ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the special mandala?

original: dri med zla zer las byung zhes bya ba gsungs te dri ma med pa'i zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems te de nyid ni 'od zer dang chos mthun pas 'od zer ro //
analyzed: dri med zla zer las byung zhes bya ba gsungs te dri ma med pa'i zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems te de nyid ni 'od zer dang chos mthun pas 'od zer ro //
translated: It is said arisen from stainless moonlight, where the stainless moon is the Thought of Enlightenment, and that itself is the moonlight, since it is similar to light.

original: de las byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
translated: Arisen from that is born.

original: bsam pa ni bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: bsam pa ni bsgom pa ste /
translated: The thought is the meditation.

original: dkyil 'khor der blo yis 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor der blo yis 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams te /
translated: In that mandala, one should introduce the assembly of beings,

original: sems can thams cad rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
translated: all sentient beings.

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The secret vajra, etc.

original: zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa ni /
analyzed: zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa ni /
translated: The moon, having become the form of melted [wax],

original: gang de ltar gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: gang de ltar gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: that which has become like that is so-called.🔽 🔽The vajra of the mind is the vajra of the mind, which is the vajra of the mind.

original: rgyal ba'i tshogs zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa des 'gro ba'i tshogs de rnams dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i tshogs zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa des 'gro ba'i tshogs de rnams dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That mass of victors, having become the form of the melted moon, should confer initiation on that mass of migrating beings.

original: gsang ba yang yin la rdo rje dam pa yang yin pas gsang ba'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: gsang ba yang yin la rdo rje dam pa yang yin pas gsang ba'i rdo rje ste /
translated: Since it is secret and also the best of vajras, it is the secret vajra.

original: de'i dbus su rnam par snad mdzad la sogs pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rnam par snad mdzad la sogs pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams gzhug par bya ste /
translated: In the middle of that, one should place the mass of victors, Vairochana and so forth.

original: rang gi lus la bcug nas /
analyzed: rang gi lus la bcug nas /
translated: Having placed them in one's body,

original: zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur ba dang / zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur zhing de rnams phyis rjes su gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su gyur ba dang / zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur zhing de rnams phyis rjes su gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and having become the form of the melted moon, the mass of victors, Vairochana and so forth, who have become the bodhicitta, should confer initiation and later be placed.

original: da ni dbang bskur ba rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dbang bskur ba rnams kyi mig la sogs pa rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the purity of the eye and so forth of those who are being initiated,

original: sa'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sa'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the root verse begins with the words, the essence of the earth, and so forth.

original: mig la sogs pa rnam pa dag pa'i rang bzhin sa'i snying po la sogs pa sa bon rnams las byung zhing bton nas /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnam pa dag pa'i rang bzhin sa'i snying po la sogs pa sa bon rnams las byung zhing bton nas /
translated: The nature of the pure eye, etc., is to arise from the seed-syllables of Kṣhi, etc., and to be emitted.

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the consecration.🔽Similarly, the goddesses of form, etc., are to be emitted.🔽Similarly, Locanā, etc., are to be emitted from the seed-syllables.

original: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyang dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ba dang / de bzhin du spyan la sogs par grags pa rnams kyang sa bon rnams las dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar pa dang / de bzhin du rnam par @202b snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi sa bon rnams las 'byung zhing gdon par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyang dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ba dang / de bzhin du spyan la sogs par grags pa rnams kyang sa bon rnams las dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar pa dang / de bzhin du rnam par @202b snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi sa bon rnams las 'byung zhing gdon par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, the Tathāgatas Vairochana, etc., are to be emitted and arisen from their own seed-syllables.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste gzugs ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //🔽tshor ba ni tshor ba'i phung pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste gzugs ni gzugs kyi phung po'o // tshor ba ni tshor ba'i phung pa'o //
translated: Form, etc. Form is the form aggregate.🔽Feeling is the feeling aggregate.

original: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
translated: Perception is the perception aggregate.

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: Compositional factors are the compositional factors aggregate.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
translated: Consciousness is the consciousness aggregate.

original: de dag tu bshad pa ni de dag gi ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: de dag tu bshad pa ni de dag gi ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa ste /
translated: The explanation of those is the teaching of their natures.

original: de yang lung las /
analyzed: de yang lung las /
translated: And that is stated in the scriptures:

original: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na //
translated: The five aggregates in brief

original: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bshad //🔽ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bshad // ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are fully explained as the five buddhas.

original: de rjes zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la'o //🔽sa bon gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
analyzed: de rjes zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la'o // sa bon gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
translated: The line “after that” means after the empowerment.

original: zhes pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i sa bon rnams kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i sa bon rnams kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: “One should bring forth with the seed” means one should bring forth with the seeds that will be explained below.

original: de rnams kyi sa bon rnams gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sa bon rnams gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are their seeds?

original: kshim zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kshim zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The text says “kṣiṃ” and so forth.

original: 'di dag ni 'og na bshad ma thag pa'i lha rnams dang rim bzhin du sbyar bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'og na bshad ma thag pa'i lha rnams dang rim bzhin du sbyar bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: These should be seen as corresponding to the deities explained below in order.

original: mig la sogs pa zhes ba ni mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa zhes ba ni mig la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa nyid do //
translated: “Eye and so forth” means that the nature of the eye and so forth is Akṣobhya and so forth.

original: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature of the objects such as form is the Vajra of Form, etc.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni spyan la sogs par bshad pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni spyan la sogs par bshad pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of the four great elements is explained as Locana, etc.

original: rtag pa la sogs pa'i'o zhes bya ba la rtag pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: rtag pa la sogs pa'i'o zhes bya ba la rtag pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The nature of permanence, etc.  is the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i zhes pa'o //
translated: What is so on account of permanence, etc. is the nature of permanence, etc. .🔽The om, etc. ,

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'od ldan ho: dang spel ba zhes bya ba ni /🔽'od dang ldan pa yang yin la /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'od ldan ho: dang spel ba zhes bya ba ni / 'od dang ldan pa yang yin la /
translated: with the addition of ho:  is as follows.🔽It is endowed with light and it is ho: .

original: ho: yang yin pas na 'od ldan ho: ste /
analyzed: ho: yang yin pas na 'od ldan ho: ste /
translated: Therefore, it is endowed with light and ho: .

original: de dag dang spel ba ni dbus su chud par byas pa de la 'od ldan ho: dang spel ba zhes bya'o//
analyzed: de dag dang spel ba ni dbus su chud par byas pa de la 'od ldan ho: dang spel ba zhes bya'o//
translated: The addition of these is the insertion of them in the middle. This is called endowed with light and ho: .

original: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni gnyis po dag gis so //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni gnyis po dag gis so //
translated: The according to the rite is by means of the two.

original: padma'i nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: padma'i nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Residing in the lotus is as follows.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i padma'i nang du bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i padma'i nang du bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He resides in the lotus of the Vajrasattva goddess.

original: mnyam pa med pa shes rab chags pas zhu bar byas par zhes bya ba la shes rab ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo ste /🔽de'i @203a * //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa shes rab chags pas zhu bar byas par zhes bya ba la shes rab ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo ste / de'i @203a * //
translated: wisdom is the goddess Vajrasattva.

original: chags pa ni shes rab chags pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa ni shes rab chags pa'o //
translated: Her passion is the passion of wisdom.

original: de yang phyin ci ma log pa'i blos rtogs shing chud pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: de yang phyin ci ma log pa'i blos rtogs shing chud pa'i tshul lo //
translated: That is the manner of being melted and penetrated by the unmistaken mind.

original: mngal na sa skye ba'i rim pa la ltos nas 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /🔽mnyam pa med pa yang yin la /
analyzed: mngal na sa skye ba'i rim pa la ltos nas 'di skad du bshad pa yin te / mnyam pa med pa yang yin la /
translated: This is explained in terms of the stages of birth in the womb.

original: shes rab kyang yin pas mnyam med shes rab chags pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyang yin pas mnyam med shes rab chags pa ste /
translated: It is incomparable and it is wisdom, so it is the incomparable passion of wisdom.

original: des zhu bar byas pa'i yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi sems su rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid bsams te /🔽zhu bar gyur ba'i sems de'i 'od kyi mthu ste /
analyzed: des zhu bar byas pa'i yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi sems su rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid bsams te / zhu bar gyur ba'i sems de'i 'od kyi mthu ste /
translated: The yogi himself should imagine the mind, which is the nature of the syllable, melted by that.

original: nus pas gnyi ga yang ste /
analyzed: nus pas gnyi ga yang ste /
translated: The power of the light of that melted mind is the ability of both.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang de'i so sor snang ba'i rig pa dag zla ba'i rnam par zhu bar byas par mthong ba dang / 'og nas bshad pa'i m'a ma k'i la sogs pas glu'i sgras bskul bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang de'i so sor snang ba'i rig pa dag zla ba'i rnam par zhu bar byas par mthong ba dang / 'og nas bshad pa'i m'a ma k'i la sogs pas glu'i sgras bskul bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that Vajrasattva and his individual awarenesses, seeing the moon-like form melt, are urged by the sound of the song of Māmakī and so forth, which will be explained below.

original: sems can khams na zhes bya ba la bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi sgo nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas rdo rje thugs zhes pos pa ste /
analyzed: sems can khams na zhes bya ba la bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi sgo nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas rdo rje thugs zhes pos pa ste /
translated: In the realm of sentient beings, the Bhagavān is called Vajra Mind because he has become the essence of the gnosis of the realm of phenomena through the door of the mind of Vajrasattva.

original: kye rdo rje'i thugs mi phyed pa'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: kye rdo rje'i thugs mi phyed pa'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: O Vajra Mind, you who possess indivisible mind, please delight me.

original: sems can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ni /
translated: The lord abiding in the realm of sentient beings

original: gtso bor gyur pas bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: gtso bor gyur pas bskyab tu gsol //
translated: is the chief, therefore, please protect me.

original: zhes pa'o // gang gis she na /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: By the one who desires the great meaning of delightful pleasure.

original: dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ste dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ste dga' ba'o //
translated: Joy is supreme joy, the joy of joy.

original: yid 'ong ni yid rab tu tshim par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong ni yid rab tu tshim par byed pa'o //
translated: Delight is the delight of the mind.

original: don chen ni bla na med pa chen po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gang yin pa de ni don chen no //
analyzed: don chen ni bla na med pa chen po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gang yin pa de ni don chen no //
translated: Great meaning is the meaning of the great, unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ste /
translated: Desire is the five sense objects such as form.

original: de rnams kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes bya ba ni bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes bya ba ni bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya'o //
translated: Please protect me with those means please delight me with those.

original: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
analyzed: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
translated: If you wish me to live, O Lord,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: gal te bdag gson par bzhed na /
analyzed: gal te bdag gson par bzhed na /
translated: if you wish me to live,

original: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku nyid du 'byung ba chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su ma mdzad nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku nyid du 'byung ba chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su ma mdzad nas /
translated: the Bhagavān, who is the embodiment of wisdom, should not manifest in the form of the purified great elements.

original: m'a ma k'i la @203b sogs pa'i lha mo rnams mi srid par gyur pas so //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i la @203b sogs pa'i lha mo rnams mi srid par gyur pas so //
translated: Because it would be impossible for the goddesses such as Māmakī and so forth.🔽Great father of sentient beings, supreme friend,

original: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: kye sems can rnams skyed par mdzad pa chen po gnyen gyi mchog ces bod pa'o //
analyzed: kye sems can rnams skyed par mdzad pa chen po gnyen gyi mchog ces bod pa'o //
translated: O you who are the great generator of sentient beings, the supreme friend.

original: da ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo /
analyzed: da ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo /
translated: Now, with regard to the goddesses Locanā, etc., he urges them by way of their respective lords,

original: rdo rje sku khyod ces bya ba la sogs pas skul bar byed do //
analyzed: rdo rje sku khyod ces bya ba la sogs pas skul bar byed do //
translated: with “O you who are Vajra Body,” etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje sku'i sgo nas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas rdo rje sku khyod ces bos pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje sku'i sgo nas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas rdo rje sku khyod ces bos pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One, having become the essence of the mirror-like intuition by way of the Vajra Body, is addressed as “O you who are Vajra Body.”

original: kye rdo rje'i sku khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: kye rdo rje'i sku khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
translated: O you who are the Vajra Body, be gracious to me.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is to be supplied.

original: bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni bka' nyid kyi 'khor lo gang la mnga' ba de ni bka'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni bka' nyid kyi 'khor lo gang la mnga' ba de ni bka'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The wheel of command is that which possesses the wheel of command itself.

original: bka'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bka'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: It is the one who turns the wheel of command.

original: sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa ni tshim par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa ni tshim par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The one who acts for the benefit of all sentient beings is the one who satisfies them.

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyi don dang byang chub dang // don dam pa ni ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de /🔽sangs rgyas pa'i don du byang chub don dam phan par rjes su gzigs pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyi don dang byang chub dang // don dam pa ni ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de / sangs rgyas pa'i don du byang chub don dam phan par rjes su gzigs pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The meaning of buddhahood, enlightenment, and the ultimate are characterized by gnosis.🔽That which has the nature of seeing the benefit of the ultimate, enlightenment, for the sake of buddhahood,

original: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam phan par gzigs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam phan par gzigs //
translated: is the ultimate benefit of enlightenment for the sake of buddhahood.

original: zhes bya'o // mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
translated: If today, Lord, you wish me to live,

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: one should understand as before.

original: 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba yin la /
translated: Passion is supreme, the bliss of passion.

original: 'dod chags dam tshig ni 'dod chags nyid dam tshig tu gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dam tshig ni 'dod chags nyid dam tshig tu gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The pledge of passion is passion itself becoming the pledge.

original: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag 'di 'dra ba la'o //
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag 'di 'dra ba la'o //
translated: One should understand as before.

original: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: One should make the supreme passion of the great hero arise.

original: da ni khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: da ni khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: Now, you are Vajra Speech, etc.

original: na bza' dkar mo rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas yang dag par skul bar byed de /
analyzed: na bza' dkar mo rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas yang dag par skul bar byed de /
translated: With the lord of her own clan, Pāṇḍaravāsinī is being urged.

original: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: You are Vajra Speech, etc.

original: gsung rdo rje'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas rdo rje gsung khyod ces bod pa ste /
analyzed: gsung rdo rje'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas rdo rje gsung khyod ces bod pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One is called “you, Vajra Speech” because of Vajra Speech, since he has become the nature of the discernment intuition.

original: kye rdo rje'i gsung khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: kye rdo rje'i gsung khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
translated: O Vajra Speech, please delight me.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽sems can thams cad la @204a * //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro // sems can thams cad la @204a * //
translated: This is the connection.

original: phan zhing thugs brtse ba'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de ni kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba'o //🔽'jig rten dag gi don ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: phan zhing thugs brtse ba'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de ni kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba'o // 'jig rten dag gi don ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The nature of being helpful and compassionate to all sentient beings is being helpful and compassionate to all.🔽The aim of the worlds is the nature of perfect enlightenment.

original: dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bde pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bde pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: The purpose is the nature of the perfection of mundane bliss.

original: de mdzad pa la rtag tu yang dag par brtson par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: de mdzad pa la rtag tu yang dag par brtson par mdzad pas na /
translated: He is always correctly striving to do that.

original: 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, he is called “one who is striving to do what is necessary and useful for the world.”

original: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
analyzed: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
translated: “Lord, if today you wish me to live…”

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained above.

original: dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: Delight is the bliss of supreme joy.

original: de nyid ni spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni spyod pa ste /
translated: That itself is conduct.

original: byang chub kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni dga' ba'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni dga' ba'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is the conduct of enlightenment is called the conduct of delight.

original: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Samantabhadra” means

original: kun nas bzang zhing dge ba mnga' bas na kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: kun nas bzang zhing dge ba mnga' bas na kun du bzang po'o //
translated: he possesses all that is good and virtuous.

original: da ni khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrol ma rang gi rigs kyi sgo nas skul bar byed de /
analyzed: da ni khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrol ma rang gi rigs kyi sgo nas skul bar byed de /
translated: Now, you are Vajra Passion, etc. urges Tara by way of her own family.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas bzang zhing rdo rjer gyur cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas bzang zhing rdo rjer gyur cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa ste /
translated: The vajra desire is the five sense objects, which are good in every way, have become vajra, and have become the nature of nondual intuition.

original: de la 'di ltar bod pa ni kye rdo rje 'od pa khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzod cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de la 'di ltar bod pa ni kye rdo rje 'od pa khyod bdag la dgyes par mdzod cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The one who is thus addressed is addressed as “O Vajra Body, be pleased with me.”

original: dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das don yod par grub pa ste /
translated: The commitment is the Lord Amoghasiddhi,

original: bya ba grub ba'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: bya ba grub ba'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: the nature of the intuition of successful activities.

original: de nyid thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur bas na dam tshig mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur bas na dam tshig mchog go //
translated: Since he is the best of all, he is the supreme commitment.

original: phan don che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phan don che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great benefit is

original: phan pa rgya che bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi don gang las byung ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: phan pa rgya che bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi don gang las byung ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: the benefit that arises from the great benefit, which has the character of unexcelled perfect enlightenment.

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung / zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rigs te /
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung / zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rigs te /
translated: The lineage of the Perfectly Awakened Ones is the lineage of perfect complete enlightenment.

original: de la thig ler gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: de la thig ler gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: Since it is a drop, it is supreme.

original: mnyam pa ni chos thams cad bdag med pas stong pa nyid kyi rjes su thugs brtse ba gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid thugs brtse ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa ni chos thams cad bdag med pas stong pa nyid kyi rjes su thugs brtse ba gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid thugs brtse ba'o //
translated: The compassion that is sameness is the compassion that is the same with respect to all phenomena, because they are empty of self.

original: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
analyzed: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
translated: If today, Lord, you wish to keep me alive,

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad par zad do //🔽yon @204b tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad par zad do // yon @204b tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur ces bya ba ni /
translated: This has already been explained.🔽You are a treasure of many jewels of good qualities.

original: yon tan rin chen mang po'i ngo bo nyid kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //🔽glu yi ngo ru byas pas na //
analyzed: yon tan rin chen mang po'i ngo bo nyid kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o // glu yi ngo ru byas pas na //
translated: You are the source of the essence of many jewels of good qualities.🔽Having made it into a song,

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i glu'i ngor byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i glu'i ngor byas pa'o //
translated: Having made it into a song as just explained.

original: chos kun sgyu ma lta bur yang dag rig / ces bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa sgyu ma dang mtshungs par bsgrubs pa ste /
analyzed: chos kun sgyu ma lta bur yang dag rig / ces bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa sgyu ma dang mtshungs par bsgrubs pa ste /
translated: This establishes that cyclic life and liberation are like an illusion.

original: gang 'di mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'di mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: This is nirvana.

original: yang rnam par dpyad na dngos po med pa yin la /
analyzed: yang rnam par dpyad na dngos po med pa yin la /
translated: When analyzed, it is not a thing.

original: 'khor ba yang de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khor ba yang de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: And cyclic life is similar to that.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par sbyor ba'i don to //
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas par sbyor ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not abide in cyclic life or in nirvana.

original: snang ba'i 'dod zer gyi ni dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: snang ba'i 'dod zer gyi ni dkyil 'khor can //
translated: 2. He is the one with the mandala of the light rays of the sun,

original: rang gi sngags kyi lus su rang nyid gyur //🔽ches bya ba la /
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyi lus su rang nyid gyur // ches bya ba la /
translated: Having become himself in the body of his mantra.🔽The meaning of the verse is this.

original: sdang ba'i 'do zer zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang ldan pa'i 'do zer can yin la /
analyzed: sdang ba'i 'do zer zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang ldan pa'i 'do zer can yin la /
translated: The “light rays of the sun” are the light rays of the sun of knowledge.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshogs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshogs te /
translated: The “mandala” of those is their assembly.🔽He who has that is “the one with the mandala of the light rays of the sun.”

original: de gang la yod pa'i rang gi sngags su gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: de gang la yod pa'i rang gi sngags su gyur pa de ni /
translated: “Having become himself in the body of his mantra” means that he has become himself in the body of his mantra.

original: snang 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i rang gi sngags kyi lus su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: snang 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i rang gi sngags kyi lus su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is the mantra body of the yogin, adorned with the light rays of appearance.

original: rang nyid gyur ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang nyid gyur ces bya ba ni /
translated: “ Having become oneself” means

original: de lta bur rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bur rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid gyur pa ste /
translated: having become oneself in that way.

original: zhu ba las yongs su gyur pa'i yi ge mam las gyur ba'i ral gri'i chad gzungs la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i yi ge mam du gnas pa'i gzugs su rang nyid du gyur ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhu ba las yongs su gyur pa'i yi ge mam las gyur ba'i ral gri'i chad gzungs la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i yi ge mam du gnas pa'i gzugs su rang nyid du gyur ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one has become the form of the letter maṃ, which is situated on a moon disk situated on a sword-handled discus arisen from the letter maṃ, arisen from the melting.

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “ That” and so forth.

original: rang gi sngags kyi lus mam gyi bdag nyid can gang yin pa der rang gi lha'i rnam par sprul ba'i thub pa'i dbang po zhugs pa dang / dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyi lus mam gyi bdag nyid can gang yin pa der rang gi lha'i rnam par sprul ba'i thub pa'i dbang po zhugs pa dang / dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning is that the Lord of Sages, the emanation of one’s deity, has entered into the mantra body of the letter maṃ, and has become glorious Mañjuvajra.

original: 'dir man ngag ni yi ge mam gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje lta bur mam gyi nang du bcug la /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni yi ge mam gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje lta bur mam gyi nang du bcug la /
translated: The esoteric instruction here is that one should place oneself in the middle of the syllable mam, like Manjusri, arisen from the light rays of the syllable mam.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: One should meditate on oneself in the form of Manjusri, arisen from the transformation of that.

original: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase endowed with glory

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: means that he is endowed with the accumulations of merit and knowledge.

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One becomes Manjusri.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul can gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur pa'o //🔽gur @205a * //🔽kum bzang po'i mdog can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul can gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur pa'o // gur @205a * // kum bzang po'i mdog can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means that one becomes Manjusri, who has the nature that will be explained below.🔽The phrase having the color of a fine saffron flower

original: gur kum bzang po lta bur dmar ba'i mdog can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gur kum bzang po lta bur dmar ba'i mdog can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: means that he is the color of a fine saffron flower.

original: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog ces bya ba la g-yas pa'i zhal dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal te de ni sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog can du gnas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog ces bya ba la g-yas pa'i zhal dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal te de ni sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog can du gnas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: His right and left faces are his right and left faces, which are blue and white.

original: sna tshogs rgyan zhes bya ba ni gdu bu dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan zhes bya ba ni gdu bu dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa ste /
translated: He is adorned with various ornaments, such as bracelets and armlets.

original: de dag gis brgyan pas na /
analyzed: de dag gis brgyan pas na /
translated: He is adorned with those ornaments.

original: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i zhes bya'o//
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i zhes bya'o//
translated: He is adorned with various ornaments.

original: phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He embraces the excellent wisdom with his two hands.

original: rang rig pa'i shes rab dang mi 'bral ba'i dang tshul can gang yin pa'i de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i shes rab dang mi 'bral ba'i dang tshul can gang yin pa'i de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: He is the one who has the manner of not being separated from the wisdom of self-awareness.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa yang yin la /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa yang yin la /
translated: He is adorned with various ornaments.

original: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa yin no //
translated: He embraces the excellent wisdom with his two hands.

original: zhes mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is the connection.

original: mdangs ldan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mdangs ldan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term radiant means

original: ral gri dang mda' mdangs dang ldan pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang mda' mdangs dang ldan pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: that he holds a radiant sword and arrow.

original: gzhan yang autpala sngon po dang / gzhu gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang autpala sngon po dang / gzhu gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Moreover, he is so called because he possesses a blue lotus and a bow.

original: mtha' yas pa ni tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa ni tshad med pa'o //
translated: Infinite means immeasurable.

original: 'od ni 'od zer ro //
analyzed: 'od ni 'od zer ro //
translated: Light means light rays.

original: ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas rnam brgyan zhing //
analyzed: ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas rnam brgyan zhing //
translated: Adorned with the emanation of all the lineages,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this verse,

original: ma lus pa'i rigs rnams rnam par 'phro ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnam par 'phro ba ste /
analyzed: ma lus pa'i rigs rnams rnam par 'phro ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnam par 'phro ba ste /
translated: the emanation of all the lineages is the emanation of the lineage of the Tathagata, etc.

original: des nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dkyil 'khor brgyan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dkyil 'khor brgyan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is adorned with the maṇḍala of the entire realm of space is so called.

original: skyob pa zhes bya ba ni skyob par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: skyob pa zhes bya ba ni skyob par mdzad pa ste /
translated: The term protector means the one who protects.

original: lta ba bzang po'i lam ston pa ste /
analyzed: lta ba bzang po'i lam ston pa ste /
translated: The path of the good view is taught.

original: 'di la mnga' bas na skyob pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la mnga' bas na skyob pa'o //
translated: Since he possesses this, he is the protector.

original: dngos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dngos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to the line all things, etc.,

original: dngos po thams cad ni dngos po'am ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad ni dngos po'am ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
translated: all things are devoid of entityness, that is, intrinsic reality.

original: gzung ba zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dngos po rnams dang / 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa nang na yongs su gsal ba'i rab bzhin can te /
analyzed: gzung ba zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dngos po rnams dang / 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa nang na yongs su gsal ba'i rab bzhin can te /
translated: The apprehended are external things, and the apprehending is the inner consciousness, which is the nature of clear awareness.

original: de dag dang bral ba ni med pa'o //
analyzed: de dag dang bral ba ni med pa'o //
translated: The absence of those is the absence of the apprehended and apprehender.

original: de ltar na dngos po ma lus pa dngos po med cing ngo bo nyid med par shes nas byin gyis @205b brlab pa ste sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po ma lus pa dngos po med cing ngo bo nyid med par shes nas byin gyis @205b brlab pa ste sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
translated: Thus, having understood that all things are non-things and essenceless, one should bless, that is, consecrate, with the mantra.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam par byang ba la mngon par zhen pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba la mngon par zhen pa ni /
translated: Because of the absence of attachment to purification,

original: med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: rnam par byang ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Purification is nirvana.

original: de la mngon par zhen pa ni /
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa ni /
translated: Attachment to that is

original: kun du chags pa ste de med pa ni phral ba'o //
analyzed: kun du chags pa ste de med pa ni phral ba'o //
translated: attachment. The absence of that is freedom.

original: de'i don du byin gyis brlab pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don du byin gyis brlab pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The consecration for that purpose is the om and so on explained below.

original: 'di dag ni bsnyen pa zhes bya ba'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsnyen pa zhes bya ba'i yan lag ste /
translated: These are the branch called approach.

original: 'di'i 'bras bu ni rgyu mthun pa chung du zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu ni rgyu mthun pa chung du zhes bya'o //
translated: The result of this is called “the lesser natural outcome.”

original: de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: After that, etc.

original: de'i 'og tu ste sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ste sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: After that, i.e., immediately after the consecration by the mantra,

original: mig la sogs pa sa'i snying po la sogs pas bkang nas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa sa'i snying po la sogs pas bkang nas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: one should meditate on Cittavajra, etc., having filled the eyes, etc., with Kṣhitigarbha, etc.

original: sa'i snying po la sogs pa khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis she na /
analyzed: sa'i snying po la sogs pa khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis she na /
translated: With what kind of distinction of Kṣhitigarbha, etc.?

original: rang snying sa bon 'od rnams kyis //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rang snying sa bon 'od rnams kyis // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: With the light of the seed in one’s heart.

original: rang zhes bya ba bdag nyid kyi ste /
analyzed: rang zhes bya ba bdag nyid kyi ste /
translated: One’s means one’s own.

original: snying po sngar bshad pa'i kshim zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzugs can yin par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: snying po sngar bshad pa'i kshim zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzugs can yin par blta bar bya ste /
translated: The heart is to be seen in the form of the previously explained Kṣhi, etc.

original: de / nyid kshim la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyi gzugs can sa'i snying po la sogs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de / nyid kshim la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyi gzugs can sa'i snying po la sogs pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That itself is the form of the seeds Kṣhi, etc., i.e., Kṣhitigarbha, etc.

original: ji bzhin bkang nas zhes bya ba ni /
