analyzed: ji bzhin bkang nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having filled them just as they are,

original: bdag nyid kyi sa bon gang dang dang yin pa de dang des de bzhin du yang dag par dgang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi sa bon gang dang dang yin pa de dang des de bzhin du yang dag par dgang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should fill it with the seed that is one's own, with that very seed.

original: 'dis ni nye bar bsgrub pa'i yan lag bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni nye bar bsgrub pa'i yan lag bshad pa yin te /
translated: This explains the branch of near-accomplishment.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa chung du zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa chung du zhes bya'o //
translated: Its result is called the small maturation.

original: dri med rang snying zla ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dri ma med pa yang yin la rang gi snying ga'i zla ba yang yin pas dri med rang snying zla ba ste /
analyzed: dri med rang snying zla ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dri ma med pa yang yin la rang gi snying ga'i zla ba yang yin pas dri med rang snying zla ba ste /
translated: The stainless one's own heart moon, etc. The stainless one is also one's own heart moon.

original: der rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i h'um las rang gi mtshan ma las byung ba'i thugs rdo rje bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: der rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i h'um las rang gi mtshan ma las byung ba'i thugs rdo rje bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: There, one should imagine the mind-vajra arisen from one's own sign in the center of the vajra hub, i.e., the hūṃ.

original: kha dang mgo bo gnyis ni kha dang mgo po ste /
analyzed: kha dang mgo bo gnyis ni kha dang mgo po ste /
translated: The mouth and the head are the mouth and the head.

original: de gnyis la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du padma dang 'khor lo bsams la /
analyzed: de gnyis la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du padma dang 'khor lo bsams la /
translated: One should imagine the lotus and the wheel in those two, respectively.

original: de dag gi lte ba'i dbus kyi cha der rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du a'a: dang aom gnyis las gsung gi rdo rje dang / @206a * //
analyzed: de dag gi lte ba'i dbus kyi cha der rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du a'a: dang aom gnyis las gsung gi rdo rje dang / @206a * //
translated: In the center of their navels, from the two syllables A and Om, respectively, are Vak-vajra and

original: sku'i rdo rje bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sku'i rdo rje bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: In the center of their navels, one should imagine, in order, the two syllables A and Om, from which come Vajra Speech and Vajra Body.🔽This is the meaning of the verse.

original: de'i snying po'i 'od zer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i snying po'i 'od zer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The light rays of their essence, etc.

original: 'dir man ngag ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Here is the instruction: in the heart of Vajra Mind, etc., on a moon one should visualize a vajra, lotus, and wheel, respectively,

original: yi ge h'um dang a'a: dang aom bsam par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um dang a'a: dang aom bsam par blta bar bya'o //
translated: on which are the syllables Hum, A, and Om.

original: de'i snying po'i 'od zer tshogs rnams kyis zhes bya ba la thugs rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams kyi snying po gang dag yod pa de ni de'i snying po ste /
analyzed: de'i snying po'i 'od zer tshogs rnams kyis zhes bya ba la thugs rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams kyi snying po gang dag yod pa de ni de'i snying po ste /
translated: The light rays of their essence means that the essence of those, Vajra Mind, etc., is their essence.

original: de'i snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba la 'dug pa'i rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: de'i snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba la 'dug pa'i rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: In their hearts, on moons, are vajras, lotuses, and wheels, respectively,

original: yi ge h'um la sogs pa gnas par blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: yi ge h'um la sogs pa gnas par blta bar bya ste /
translated: One should view the syllables such as HŪṀ as abiding.

original: de rnams kyi 'od zer ni de'i snying po'i 'od zer ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'od zer ni de'i snying po'i 'od zer ro //
translated: Their light rays are the light rays of its essence.

original: de'i tshogs ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu ste /
analyzed: de'i tshogs ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu ste /
translated: Its assembly is like a circle of the maṇḍala.

original: rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams kyis de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i sgo nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i thugs rdo rje la sogs pa yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams kyis de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i sgo nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i thugs rdo rje la sogs pa yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: The lords of the victors, having perfectly worshipped the vajra mind, etc., which abide in the ten directions, by means of the offering goddesses such as the vajra form arisen from its light rays,

original: de'i 'og tu phyi dang nang na gnas pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu phyi dang nang na gnas pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: then one should consecrate the outer and inner.

original: khyad par ji lta bus yang dag par mchod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bus yang dag par mchod par bya zhe na /
translated: By what kind of distinction should one perfectly worship?

original: shes rab dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: shes rab dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “with the light of the assembly of sublime insight,” etc.

original: shes rab dam pa 'dus pa'i 'od rnams kyis //
analyzed: shes rab dam pa 'dus pa'i 'od rnams kyis //
translated: The light of the assembly of sublime insight

original: zhes bya ba la shes rab dam pa ni rang gi so sor snang ba'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la shes rab dam pa ni rang gi so sor snang ba'i shes rab bo //
translated: Sublime insight is one’s own individually appearing insight.

original: de'i 'dus pa ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i 'dus pa ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
translated: Its assembly is the correct union.

original: des snang ba'i dang tshul can gang la yod pa de ni shes rab dam pa 'dus pa'i 'od rnams te /
analyzed: des snang ba'i dang tshul can gang la yod pa de ni shes rab dam pa 'dus pa'i 'od rnams te /
translated: Those who have the light of the assembly of the highest wisdom are the lights of the assembly of the highest wisdom.

original: de rnams kyis kun nas zhes bya ba dngos po thams cad kyis rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de rnams kyis kun nas zhes bya ba dngos po thams cad kyis rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba /
translated: By them, all around, all things, the lords of the victors,

original: thugs rdo rje la sogs pa yang dag par mchod nas /
analyzed: thugs rdo rje la sogs pa yang dag par mchod nas /
translated: having made offerings to the mind vajra and so forth,

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
translated: one should consecrate the mind vajra and so forth by the process explained below.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Glorious vajra, etc.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
translated: Holding the glorious vajra mind,

original: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
analyzed: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
translated: today I am consecrated,

original: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol //
translated: please make me the vajra mind.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: This is the connection.

original: rdo rje thugs kyis zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje thugs kyis zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: Vajra mind means the mind vajra.

original: de yang thugs rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms @206b pas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yang thugs rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms @206b pas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Moreover, the mind vajra is meditated on as the three inseparable ones.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind vajras are the three vajras.

original: de ni mi phyed pa yin la de bsgom pa ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa ste /
analyzed: de ni mi phyed pa yin la de bsgom pa ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa ste /
translated: That is the indivisible, and the meditation on that is the meditation on the indivisible three vajras.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “its nature” is the meaning of “its essence.”

original: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The Buddhas dwelling in the ten directions

original: zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje'i gzugs can te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje'i gzugs can te /
translated: means the form of the vajra of mind.

original: de rnams kyang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su mdzad de bdag byin gyis rlobs shig ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su mdzad de bdag byin gyis rlobs shig ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: They also act as the place of consecration of myself, and I should be consecrated.

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra of consecration🔽is stated as “Oṃ vajra-buddha-ṣṭvaṃ

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: abhiṣiñcāmi” and so on.

original: 'di dag gis ni thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: These state the consecration as the vajra of mind.

original: da ni gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to consecrate as the vajra of speech, [the Bhagavān] declares the Dharma realm, and so on.

original: chos de gsung gi rdo rje can gyis bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su mdzad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos de gsung gi rdo rje can gyis bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su mdzad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That Dharma, the one having the vajra of speech, should act as the place of consecration of myself.

original: gsung lam zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsung lam zhes bya ba la /
translated: The path of speech🔽is the path of the vajra of speech.

original: gsung nyid kyi lam yin pas na gsung lam ste /
analyzed: gsung nyid kyi lam yin pas na gsung lam ste /
translated: The path of speech is the path of speech itself.

original: des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bzhud par mdzad cing rtag tu bdag med par ston pa'i gsung ngo //
analyzed: des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bzhud par mdzad cing rtag tu bdag med par ston pa'i gsung ngo //
translated: It is the speech of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, which is the path of speech, which always teaches selflessness.

original: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The Buddhas who dwell in the ten directions

original: zhes bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i gzugs can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i gzugs can no //
translated: are the form of Vajra Speech.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
translated: By meditating on the three vajras which are indivisible,

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: this has been explained.

original: gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni /
translated: The mantra for the consecration of Vajra Speech is:🔽Om Vajra Vāk, Vajra Vāk,🔽Vāk Vajra Sarva Ākāra Vairocana, Vajra Vāk Āḥ.

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //🔽rdo rje'i skus bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su mdzod cig ces bya bar sbyar te lhag ma ni sngar bshad pas go bar mdzad do //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // rdo rje'i skus bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas su mdzod cig ces bya bar sbyar te lhag ma ni sngar bshad pas go bar mdzad do //
translated: The meaning of this is: Om! Vajra Speech! Vajra Speech!🔽 Speech Vajra! All Forms! Illuminator! Vajra Speech! Ah!

original: sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni /
analyzed: sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra for the consecration of Vajra Body is:🔽Om Vajra Kāya, Vajra Kāya,

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Kāya Vajra Sarva Ākāra Vairocana, Vajra Kāya Āḥ.

original: 'di dag ni sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i yan lag ste /
translated: These are the branch called the accomplishment.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa chung du zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa chung du zhes bya'o //
translated: Its result is called “the small human action.”

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the line “the sky, etc.,”

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: the three vajras are body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje gsum po ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The three vajras are the nature of the sky,

original: dngos po med pa mtshan nyid bral bar dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa mtshan nyid bral bar dmigs par bya ste /
translated: which is to be visualized as the absence of entities, free of characteristics.

original: de ltar dmigs shing mthong ba dang / thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba rig pa'i tshogs phyag na bum pa thogs te /
analyzed: de ltar dmigs shing mthong ba dang / thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba rig pa'i tshogs phyag na bum pa thogs te /
translated: When one visualizes and sees in that way, the hosts of awareness beings that emerge from the light rays of the supreme sage, holding vases in their hands,

original: ye shes kyi chus dbang bskur ba dang / rang gi rigs kyi bdag por snang ba'i cod pan du 'gyur ro @207a * //
analyzed: ye shes kyi chus dbang bskur ba dang / rang gi rigs kyi bdag por snang ba'i cod pan du 'gyur ro @207a * //
translated: confer empowerment with the water of awareness, and appear as the crown of one’s own family’s lord.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro // mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is to be applied.🔽“Free of characteristics”

original: gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: means free of the characteristics of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: de nyid kyis na nam mkha' lta bu'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na nam mkha' lta bu'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: For that very reason, it is the nature of the sky.

original: phyogs tshogs kun na bzhugs pa'i thub pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: phyogs tshogs kun na bzhugs pa'i thub pa'i tshogs //
translated: The hosts of sages who dwell in all directions

original: zhes bya ba la phyogs kyi tshogs kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la phyogs kyi tshogs kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na /
translated: The compound all directions is a dvandva compound, and assemblies is a tatpurusa compound.

original: phyogs kyi tshogs kun te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi tshogs kun te /
translated: The compound all directions is a dvandva compound, and assemblies is a tatpurusa compound.

original: der bzhugs pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: der bzhugs pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has the nature of abiding there is called all-direction-assembly-abider.

original: snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag par bskul zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag par bskul zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase having been fully impelled by the light rays of the essence means

original: snying po'i 'od zer te ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag par bskul ba'o //
analyzed: snying po'i 'od zer te ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag par bskul ba'o //
translated: having been fully impelled by the light rays of the essence, that is, the light rays of the gnosis being's essence.

original: 'dir man ngag ni thugs rdo rje dang gsung rdo rje gnyis kyi bar na /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni thugs rdo rje dang gsung rdo rje gnyis kyi bar na /
translated: Here is the instruction: Between the two, the mind vajra and the speech vajra,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs can zla ba la gnas pa'i ral gri'i chang gzugs kyi dbus na gnas pa'i zla ba la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs can zla ba la gnas pa'i ral gri'i chang gzugs kyi dbus na gnas pa'i zla ba la bzhugs pa /
translated: the Bhagavat, in the form of the gnosis being, the sword form of Manjushri, abiding in the middle of the moon, is abiding on the moon in the middle of the sword form.

original: thugs rdo rje la sogs pa bskyed pa'i dus su 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: thugs rdo rje la sogs pa bskyed pa'i dus su 'di ltar blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is how it should be viewed at the time of generating the mind vajra and so forth.

original: thub pa'i tshogs 'od zer gyis bskul ba dang / thub pa'i mchog rnams kyi 'od zer de rnams las kyang byung ba'i rig pa'i tshogs rnams ni thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba'i rig pa ste /🔽de'i tshogs ni phung po yin la /
analyzed: thub pa'i tshogs 'od zer gyis bskul ba dang / thub pa'i mchog rnams kyi 'od zer de rnams las kyang byung ba'i rig pa'i tshogs rnams ni thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer las byung ba'i rig pa ste / de'i tshogs ni phung po yin la /
translated: The assembly of sages is the assembly of vidyas that arise from the light rays of the supreme sages, and the assembly of those is a group.

original: de'i phyag na bum pa bsnams pa'i bum pa de rnams las ye shes kyi chur gyur pas dbang bskur ba dang / 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi rang gi rigs kyi gtso bor snang ba'i cod pan du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyag na bum pa bsnams pa'i bum pa de rnams las ye shes kyi chur gyur pas dbang bskur ba dang / 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi rang gi rigs kyi gtso bor snang ba'i cod pan du gyur pa ste /
translated: The vases held in their hands are vases from which the water of gnosis arises, which is the empowerment conferred, and the crown of the practitioner of Manjushri Vajra, which appears as the chief of one's own lineage.

original: rang gi rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa yin la /
translated: The lord of one's own lineage is Akshobhya.

original: des brgyan pa'i cod pan gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des brgyan pa'i cod pan gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is adorned by him is called a crown.

original: de yang dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i cod pan la mi sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: de yang dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i cod pan la mi sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste /
translated: Moreover, the crown of Manjushri Vajra is not accomplished after the empowerment, but it is a branch of the great accomplishment.

original: 'di'i 'bras bu ni dbang gi sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu ni dbang gi sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste /
translated: The result of that is the great accomplishment of empowerment, which is a branch of the great accomplishment.

original: 'di'i 'bras bu ni dbang gi 'bras bu chung du zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu ni dbang gi 'bras bu chung du zhes bya'o //
translated: The result of this is called the lesser dominant result.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase “in the same way” and so on means that🔽one should visualize and contemplate the appearance of one’s own deity, which is characterized by the individual self-appearance of the knowledge being, in the same way as before, through the stages of the service and so on.

original: snga ma bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rang gi lha dang 'dra ba'i rig pa so sor rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid can bsam zhing bltas la rigs lnga kun du bkod de /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rang gi lha dang 'dra ba'i rig pa so sor rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid can bsam zhing bltas la rigs lnga kun du bkod de / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: One should visualize the five families,

original: de dang yang dag @207b pa'i dga' ba brtsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dang yang dag @207b pa'i dga' ba brtsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: and one should commence the true joy with them in order to please the tathāgatas.

original: rang gi snying po ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sa bon te /
analyzed: rang gi snying po ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sa bon te /
translated: One’s essence is the seed of Mañjuvajra.

original: des sprul pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: des sprul pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: One should emanate with that.

original: de ltar na 'dis ni 'di'i bsnyen pa ston to //🔽mig la sogs pa dag cing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dis ni 'di'i bsnyen pa ston to // mig la sogs pa dag cing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In this way, this teaches the service of this [deity].🔽The phrase “the eyes and so on are purified” means

original: sngar bshad pa'i sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis mig la sogs pa'i kun du dgang ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams kyis mig la sogs pa'i kun du dgang ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: that the eyes and so on are filled with the seeds of Kṣitigarbha and so on, as explained above.

original: 'dis ni nye bar bsgrub pa ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni nye bar bsgrub pa ston to //
translated: This shows the near-accomplishment.

original: yi ge gsum po ni aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yi ge gsum po ni aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The three syllables are Om, Ah, and Hum.🔽By that meditation through the consecration of body, speech, and mind, the body becomes radiant.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sgo nas bsgom pa des lus 'od dang ldan par gyur pa de ni yi ge 'dis ni nye bar bsgrub pa ston to //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sgo nas bsgom pa des lus 'od dang ldan par gyur pa de ni yi ge 'dis ni nye bar bsgrub pa ston to //
translated: This shows the near-accomplishment.

original: gsum rnam par bkod pas lus ni 'od dang ldan zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gsum rnam par bkod pas lus ni 'od dang ldan zhes bya ste /
translated: The body is radiant through the arrangement of the three.

original: 'dis ni 'di'i sgrub pa ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di'i sgrub pa ston to //
translated: This shows the accomplishment.

original: sgrub pa chen po ma gsungs su zin kyang /
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po ma gsungs su zin kyang /
translated: Even though the great accomplishment is not mentioned,

original: bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa las de bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i nye bar mtshon pa las de bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood as being done from the indication of the approach, etc.

original: 'di'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni rgyu mthun pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bar ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni rgyu mthun pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bar ma yin no //
translated: The approach, etc. of this are the intermediate results of the natural result, etc.

original: de nyid shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nyid shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: By the knowledge of that, etc.

original: de kho na nyid shes pas mgo dang snying ga dang lte ba dang / gsang ba dang / de bzhin du brla gnyis la sogs par yi ge lnga pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag can du yang dag par bsams te ;
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes pas mgo dang snying ga dang lte ba dang / gsang ba dang / de bzhin du brla gnyis la sogs par yi ge lnga pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag can du yang dag par bsams te ;
translated: Having understood reality, one should imagine that one's body is empowered by the five syllables at the head, throat, heart, navel, and secret place, and likewise at the two thighs, and so forth.

original: dga' ba kun du brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dga' ba kun du brtsam par bya'o //
translated: One should commence the practice of all joys.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is how it should be applied.

original: lnga po gang dag gis she na /
analyzed: lnga po gang dag gis she na /
translated: By which five?

original: de ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje bzang rigs sogs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje bzang rigs sogs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: That is stated by the good vajra body, speech, mind, and so forth.

original: sku rdo rje'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
translated: The vajra body family is the Tathagata family.

original: thugs rdo rje'i rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs so ;
analyzed: thugs rdo rje'i rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs so ;
translated: The vajra mind family is the vajra family.

original: / sogs pa'i sgras ni rin po che'i rigs dang padma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs bsdu'o //
analyzed: / sogs pa'i sgras ni rin po che'i rigs dang padma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs bsdu'o //
translated: The term and so forth includes the jewel family, the lotus family, and the action family.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: aom h'um sv'a a'a: h'a zhes grags pa rnams //
analyzed: aom h'um sv'a a'a: h'a zhes grags pa rnams //
translated: The well-known Om, Hum, Sva, Ah, and Ha,

original: 'od kyi phreng ba dam pas 'gro gsum khyab //
analyzed: 'od kyi phreng ba dam pas 'gro gsum khyab //
translated: pervade the three worlds with a sublime garland of light.

original: ces sbyar te /
analyzed: ces sbyar te /
translated: This is how it should be applied.

original: yi ge lnga 'jig rten gsum khyab pa'i 'od kyi tshogs dang bcas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge lnga 'jig rten gsum khyab pa'i 'od kyi tshogs dang bcas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which is the five syllables together with a mass of light pervading the three worlds is so called.

original: aa yis sna tshogs padma'i lte ba byas //
analyzed: aa yis sna tshogs padma'i lte ba byas //
translated: A makes the center of the variegated lotus.

original: h'um gis 'dab ma brgyad po rnam par sprul //
analyzed: h'um gis 'dab ma brgyad po rnam par sprul //
translated: Hum emanates the eight petals.🔽That which is the lotus having a center made by the syllable A, variegated and beautiful,

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽yi ge aas sna tshogs shing mdzes pa'i lte ba byas pa'i padma gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / yi ge aas sna tshogs shing mdzes pa'i lte ba byas pa'i padma gang yin pa de ni /
translated: is so called.🔽A makes the center of the variegated lotus.

original: aa yis sna tshogs padma'i lte ba byas//
analyzed: aa yis sna tshogs padma'i lte ba byas//
translated: That which is the emanation, the generation, of the eight petals by the syllable Hum,

original: @208a * // zhes bya ba la /🔽yi ge h'um gis 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul zhing bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: @208a * // zhes bya ba la / yi ge h'um gis 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul zhing bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: is so called.

original: h'um gis 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul //
analyzed: h'um gis 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul //
translated: Hum emanates the eight petals.

original: zhes bya'o // ji lta bu'i dga' ba brtsam par bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // ji lta bu'i dga' ba brtsam par bya zhe na /
translated: In what way should one begin the joy?

original: shes rab dam pa'i rgyu mthun ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: shes rab dam pa'i rgyu mthun ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of the natural outflow of sublime wisdom,

original: thabs dang bcas par gyur pa'i rang gi lus //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas par gyur pa'i rang gi lus //
translated: one's own body together with the method,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: is so called.

original: shes rab dam pa ni bdag med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: shes rab dam pa ni bdag med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Sublime wisdom is the wisdom of selflessness.

original: yab tu gyur pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: yab tu gyur pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i shes rab bo //
translated: The wisdom of Vajrasattva, who is the father.

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
translated: The essence of that natural outflow is

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid de //
translated: the nature of Manjusri.

original: des thabs dang bcas shing ldan par byung ba'i rang gi lus can gyi sngags gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des thabs dang bcas shing ldan par byung ba'i rang gi lus can gyi sngags gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That mantra which has that as its means and which has a body that has arisen from it is so called.

original: de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes bya zhes //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes bya zhes // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By that, the Sugata is pleased.

original: de ltar shes bzhin du de dang bsngags pas lhan cig dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar shes bzhin du de dang bsngags pas lhan cig dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
translated: Thus knowing, one should commence the joy together with that mantra.

original: rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa ni aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa ni aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: The mantra for pleasing is stated with OṀ and so forth.

original: 'di dag ni dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di dag ni dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: These are the samadhis called the first application.

original: thugs ka'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa'i ral gri'i chang gzungs la 'dug pa'i zla ba la brten pa'i rang gi sngags ni thugs ka'i zla ba'i sngags te ;
analyzed: thugs ka'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa'i ral gri'i chang gzungs la 'dug pa'i zla ba la brten pa'i rang gi sngags ni thugs ka'i zla ba'i sngags te ;
translated: The mantra on the moon at the heart of the sword in the heart of the gnosis being is the mantra on the moon at the heart.

original: de'i 'od ces bya ba ni 'od zer te /
analyzed: de'i 'od ces bya ba ni 'od zer te /
translated: The light rays are the light rays.

original: de rnams kyis ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs rnams rang gi lus la bcug nas yi ge h'um las rdo rje bsam pa ni h'um gyi rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs rnams rang gi lus la bcug nas yi ge h'um las rdo rje bsam pa ni h'um gyi rdo rje ste /
translated: Having caused the entire assembly of buddhas to enter one’s body, one should imagine a vajra from the syllable hūṃ.

original: de las byung ba ni mthun pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni mthun pa'o //
translated: The one arisen from hūṃ is the one arisen from hūṃ.

original: de yang dri ma med pa yin pas /
analyzed: de yang dri ma med pa yin pas /
translated: Since that is stainless,

original: h'um gi rdo rje las byung dri med pa //
analyzed: h'um gi rdo rje las byung dri med pa //
translated: it is the stainless one arisen from hūṃ.

original: zhes bya'o // yid tshul dam pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul lo //🔽chu skyes la gnas ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // yid tshul dam pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul lo // chu skyes la gnas ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The excellent way is the way of the mind of enlightenment.🔽Residing on a lotus is

original: lha mo'i padma'i nang na gnas pa ste /
analyzed: lha mo'i padma'i nang na gnas pa ste /
translated: residing in the lotus of the goddess.

original: de rang gi snying po las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor pa ma lus pa'i gzugs su bsams la cho ga 'dis dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de rang gi snying po las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor pa ma lus pa'i gzugs su bsams la cho ga 'dis dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having imagined that one’s own heart arises as the form of all the maṇḍala deities, one should emit them with this rite.

original: ma lus pa yang yin la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor ba yang yin pas ma lus pa'i dkyil 'khor pa ste /
analyzed: ma lus pa yang yin la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor ba yang yin pas ma lus pa'i dkyil 'khor pa ste /
translated: And since they are all the maṇḍala deities of Akṣhobhya, etc., they are all the maṇḍala deities.

original: de rnams kyi gzugs su rang gi snying po las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gzugs su rang gi snying po las byung ba ste /
translated: Their form arises from one’s own heart,

original: rang gi sa bon las skyes par bsam mo //
analyzed: rang gi sa bon las skyes par bsam mo //
translated: having been born from one’s own seed.

original: cho ga zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas sems brtan pa ste /
analyzed: cho ga zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas sems brtan pa ste /
translated: The rite is the rite explained below, which is the stabilization of the mind.

original: @208b mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang padma'i nang nas 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'jig rten la phan pa'i don du yang dag par dbyung bar bya zhing gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: @208b mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang padma'i nang nas 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'jig rten la phan pa'i don du yang dag par dbyung bar bya zhing gdon par bya'o //
translated: The mind of meditative equipoise, from within the lotus, for the sake of the welfare of the world, should be emitted, should be brought forth, for the sake of the welfare of the world.

original: badzra dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa la thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs la gzhug par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: badzra dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa la thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs la gzhug par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: In the case of the mantra vajra-dhrika, etc., Vajra Mind means that one should enter into the form of Manjushri, who is the nature of Akshobhya.

original: skye bo dam pa'i don mdzad ces bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can thob par 'dod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: skye bo dam pa'i don mdzad ces bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can thob par 'dod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The accomplisher of the aims of holy beings is one who desires to attain the character of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: nor bu sngon po'i 'od 'dra yang dag 'bar //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nor bu sngon po'i 'od 'dra yang dag 'bar // zhes bya ba la /
translated: He is blazing with the light of a blue gem.

original: nor bu yang yin la sngon po yang yin pas nor bu sngon po ste /
analyzed: nor bu yang yin la sngon po yang yin pas nor bu sngon po ste /
translated: A blue gem is a gem that is blue.

original: de'i 'od dang rang gi gzugs 'dra bar yang dag par 'bar ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //🔽g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar //
analyzed: de'i 'od dang rang gi gzugs 'dra bar yang dag par 'bar ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o // g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar //
translated: It is blazing in the sense that it is similar to its own form, the light of the gem.🔽His right and left faces are white and red.

original: zhes bya ba ni zhal g-yas dkar zhing g-yon dmar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhal g-yas dkar zhing g-yon dmar ba'o //
translated: His right face is white and his left face is red.

original: dam pa dang po lta bu'i phyag dang ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dam pa dang po lta bu'i phyag dang ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He has hands like the best of the first.

original: dam pa dang po ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: dam pa dang po ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The first pledge is the Blessed One, glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de dang 'dra bar phyag na rdo rje dang ral gri dang padma dang nor bu bsnams pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar phyag na rdo rje dang ral gri dang padma dang nor bu bsnams pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is similar to him, holding a vajra, sword, lotus, and gem in his hands.

original: kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od tshogs mnga' //
analyzed: kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od tshogs mnga' //
translated: He has an assembly of light rays of immeasurable color.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dpag tu med pa ste mdog du ma'i 'od kyi tshogs kyi phung po gang la mnga' ba'i thugs rdo rje de la ni de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha dog dpag tu med pa ste mdog du ma'i 'od kyi tshogs kyi phung po gang la mnga' ba'i thugs rdo rje de la ni de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The mind-vajra is so called because it has an assembly of light rays of immeasurable color, of many hues.

original: de blo dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de blo dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The wise one,

original: shes rab dang ldan zhing gzhug pa po'i 'dzin pa spangs pas legs par bsdus shing bkug nas bdag nyid la dngos po thams cad kyis gzhug par bya zhing bstim par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan zhing gzhug pa po'i 'dzin pa spangs pas legs par bsdus shing bkug nas bdag nyid la dngos po thams cad kyis gzhug par bya zhing bstim par bya'o //
translated: endowed with wisdom, having well gathered and drawn in the pledge of the inducting one, should induct all things into himself and dissolve them.

original: sku rdo rje bskul la shar phyogs kyi padma dang zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sku rdo rje bskul la shar phyogs kyi padma dang zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: He should visualize the body-vajra in the east, in the center of a lotus and moon.

original: rdo rje 'dzin 'dra zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin 'dra zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu ste /
translated: Resembling Vajradhara means like Vajrasattva.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog dang zhal gang la mnga' ba de ni /🔽rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i sku mdog zhal gyis mdzes //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog dang zhal gang la mnga' ba de ni / rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i sku mdog zhal gyis mdzes //
translated: He who has a complexion and face resembling him

original: zhes bya'o // de ni 'khor lo la sogs phyag mtshan bsnams //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de ni 'khor lo la sogs phyag mtshan bsnams //
translated: is called “adorned with a complexion and face resembling Vajradhara.”🔽He holds the emblems of the wheel and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo dang ral gri dang padma dang nor bu bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo dang ral gri dang padma dang nor bu bsnams pa'o //
translated: He holds the wheel, sword, lotus, and jewel.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje ji ltar bskul ba de bzhin du yang dag par bskul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rin @209a * //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje ji ltar bskul ba de bzhin du yang dag par bskul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // rin @209a * //
translated: Just so means just as the mind vajra is summoned, so should he be summoned.

original: chen 'byung ldan bskul la 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i g-yas su bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: chen 'byung ldan bskul la 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i g-yas su bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Ratnasaṃbhava is summoned, and Mañjuvajra is to be visualized to the right of him.

original: zhal gzhon nu 'dra zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhal gzhon nu 'dra zhes bya ba la /
translated: He has a face resembling a youth.

original: gzhon nu ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste de dang 'dra ba'i mdangs kyi rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la ni de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: gzhon nu ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste de dang 'dra ba'i mdangs kyi rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la ni de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The youth is the Bhagavat Mañjuvajra. He who has a complexion resembling him is so called.

original: zhal dbus ma ser po la g-yas sngo ba g-yon dkar ba'o //
analyzed: zhal dbus ma ser po la g-yas sngo ba g-yon dkar ba'o //
translated: The central face is yellow, the right is blue, and the left is white.

original: gzhan yang gzhon nu dang 'dra ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhon nu dang 'dra ba ni /
translated: Moreover, he is like a youth,

original: btso ma'i gser gyi mdangs dang 'dra ba la //
analyzed: btso ma'i gser gyi mdangs dang 'dra ba la //
translated: like the luster of refined gold.

original: zhes bya ba ste gser zhun ma'i mdangs dang 'dra zhing de dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste gser zhun ma'i mdangs dang 'dra zhing de dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: He is like the luster of refined gold, and is similar to that.

original: phyag drug mar gang rin chen la sogs bsnams //
analyzed: phyag drug mar gang rin chen la sogs bsnams //
translated: He holds a ruby and so forth in his six hands.

original: zhes bya ba la mar gad rin chen ni nor bu kha dog ljang gu ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la mar gad rin chen ni nor bu kha dog ljang gu ste /
translated: A ruby is a jewel of green color.

original: de la sogs pa ni ral gri dang / padma dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khyud par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni mar gad rin chen la sogs bsnams pa ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni ral gri dang / padma dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khyud par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni mar gad rin chen la sogs bsnams pa ste /
translated: He holds a sword, lotus, wheel, and embraces with his six hands, whatever it is that he holds, a ruby and so forth.

original: de lta bus mdzad pa'i phyag drug gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bus mdzad pa'i phyag drug gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has such six hands is so called.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa bskul la bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i nub tu bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa bskul la bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i nub tu bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: He is to be contemplated to the west of the Bhagavat Manjusrivajra, having been summoned from the realm of the lord Amitabha.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is his special feature?

original: padma r'a ga ltar dmar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: padma r'a ga ltar dmar zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The line red like a ruby is stated.

original: chu skyes ltar dmar ba ni padma r'a ga'i nor bu ste /
analyzed: chu skyes ltar dmar ba ni padma r'a ga'i nor bu ste /
translated: A ruby is a water-born gem, red like a lotus.

original: de dang 'dra bar mdangs dmar zhing dmar ba'i mdog can te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar mdangs dmar zhing dmar ba'i mdog can te /
translated: It is red, having a red luster.

original: padma r'a ga ltar dmar ba'o //
analyzed: padma r'a ga ltar dmar ba'o //
translated: It is red like a ruby.

original: zhal gnyis de dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhal g-yas pa dang / g-yon pa de gzhon nu'i zhal dang 'dra bar sngo ba dang dkar bar blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhal gnyis de dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhal g-yas pa dang / g-yon pa de gzhon nu'i zhal dang 'dra bar sngo ba dang dkar bar blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The line the two faces are like that means that the right and left faces of Amitābha should be seen as being blue and white, like the faces of the two boys.

original: 'od zer 'bar zhing zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'bar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar zhing zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'bar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The line blazing with light rays means that he has a luster that is blazing in one place.

original: phyag na padma la sogs mtshan bsnams pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽padma dmar po dang de la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyag na padma la sogs mtshan bsnams pa // zhes bya ba ni / padma dmar po dang de la sogs pa ste /
translated: He holds a lotus and so forth in his hands.🔽The line red like a ruby means that he holds a red lotus and so forth in his hands.

original: ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rin po che bsnams pa'i phyag gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //

analyzed: de yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: thams cad kyang tshul 'di ltar bsam pa'o //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: 'og ma gsum char nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: me'i phyogs su bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: mchog tu sgeg cing sku yi rdo rje 'dra //

original: zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: bden bral gyi mtshams su bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /

analyzed: zhal mdzes phyag rnams thugs kyi gtso bo 'dra //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi gtso bo ni mi bskyod pa yin la /

analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: yon tan rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: gang gi yon tan mtha' yas pa nyid rin po che yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /

analyzed: rin po che yang yin pas na dri med rin chen te /

analyzed: de dang gzugs dang sku mdog 'dra ba'i phyir rin chen dbang 'dra zhes bya'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni bdag po ji bzhin 'dod //

analyzed: m'a ma k'i yang de dang 'dra'o //

analyzed: sgrol ma'i ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //

analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas dbyung bar blta bar bya'o //

analyzed: de dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'o //

analyzed: de yang gzugs rdo rje ni sku rdo rje lta bu la phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo ni me long /

analyzed: lhag ma ral gri dang padma dang rin po che bsnams pa'o //

original: sgra rdo rje ni thugs rdo rje dang 'dra ba la /
analyzed: sgra rdo rje ni thugs rdo rje dang 'dra ba la /

original: 'di'i phyag mtshan gtso bo ni pi wang ste /
analyzed: 'di'i phyag mtshan gtso bo ni pi wang ste /

analyzed: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //

original: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
translated: The remaining two hands hold a sword, lotus, and jewel.

original: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
translated: The remaining two hands hold a sword, lotus, and jewel.

analyzed: reg rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa lta bu la 'di'i phyag mtshan gtso bo ni lha'i gos so //

original: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
translated: The remaining two hands hold a sword, lotus, and jewel.

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu la /

analyzed: 'di'i phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo ni chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya /

original: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni ral gri dang padma dang rin po che'o //
translated: The rest are the sword, lotus, and jewel.

analyzed: gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ni nyi ma'i bu mthar byed pa ste /

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /

analyzed: mtha' yas 'jigs 'od phyogs kun khyab dang ldan //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: mtha'i mi bzad sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mdog / ces bya ba la /
translated: The color of the mass of clouds at the end of time.

original: dus mtha' ni 'jigs pa'i dus so //
analyzed: dus mtha' ni 'jigs pa'i dus so //

original: mi bzad sprin ni char sprin nag po ste /
analyzed: mi bzad sprin ni char sprin nag po ste /

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni phung po'i tshogs te /
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni phung po'i tshogs te /
translated: The mass of that is a collection of aggregates.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i mdog gi rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o//
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i mdog gi rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o//
translated: He is called that because he has a nature that is like that color.

original: thugs kyi rgyal po dag dang sku mtshungs pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thugs kyi rgyal po dag dang sku mtshungs pa // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The king of minds is the same as the body.

original: thugs kyi rgyal po ni mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: thugs kyi rgyal po ni mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: The king of minds is Akshobhya.

original: de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is called that because he is the same as, and similar to, that.

original: drag po'i rigs 'od dpag med rnam 'phro bas //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: drag po'i rigs 'od dpag med rnam 'phro bas // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The fierce lineage is the emanation of Amitabha.

original: drag po'i rigs kyang yin la /
analyzed: drag po'i rigs kyang yin la /
translated: He is the fierce lineage.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa rnam par 'phro ba yang yin pas de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa rnam par 'phro ba yang yin pas de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Since he is also a radiant, immeasurable light, he is so-called.

original: drag po'i tshogs de rnams kyi 'od zer dpag tu med pas gzugs mtshan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: drag po'i tshogs de rnams kyi 'od zer dpag tu med pas gzugs mtshan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since the immeasurable light rays of that host of wrathful ones are radiant, the meaning is that he is the one who is marked with form.

original: gshin rje mthar byed 'byin zhes bya ba ni gshin rje 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed 'byin zhes bya ba ni gshin rje 'joms pa'o //
translated: Yama-terminator means the one who conquers Yama.

original: gdug pa'i sprul gyis yan lag rnam brgyan pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gdug pa'i sprul gyis yan lag rnam brgyan pa // zhes bya ba la /
translated: He is adorned with the limbs of a very wrathful serpent.

original: shin tu gdug pa'i sprul ni lce rnam par bskyod pa dang ldan zhing gdengs ka rnam par g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: shin tu gdug pa'i sprul ni lce rnam par bskyod pa dang ldan zhing gdengs ka rnam par g-yo ba ste /
translated: A very wrathful serpent is one with a quivering tongue and a flickering hood.

original: des lus kyi yan lag rnam par brgyan pa ni dpung rgyan dang gdu bu la sogs par byas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des lus kyi yan lag rnam par brgyan pa ni dpung rgyan dang gdu bu la sogs par byas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so-called because he is adorned with limbs of a body that are made into armlets, bracelets, and so forth.

original: pradzny'anta krita ces pas khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa bskul la lho phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: pradzny'anta krita ces pas khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa bskul la lho phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Prajnantaka-krita means that one should visualize Wrathful Acala on the sun maṇḍala at the southern gate, as before.

original: bla med 'od ces bya ba ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mi shes pa sel bar byed pa'i 'od bla na med pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bla med 'od ces bya ba ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mi shes pa sel bar byed pa'i 'od bla na med pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one called “supreme light” is so called because he possesses the supreme light that dispels the ignorance of all migrating beings.

original: drag cing zhes bya ba ni kun gyi mngon sum du rab tu gtum par snang ba'o //
analyzed: drag cing zhes bya ba ni kun gyi mngon sum du rab tu gtum par snang ba'o //
translated: “Fierce” means that he appears to be very wrathful in the direct perception of all.

original: phyag sogs sku yi rdo rje 'dra //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: phyag sogs sku yi rdo rje 'dra // zhes pa la /
translated: “Like the body-vajra” means

original: sku'i rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de la zhal dang phyag dang / sku mdog la sogs pa de dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: sku'i rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de la zhal dang phyag dang / sku mdog la sogs pa de dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: that the body-vajra is Vairocana, and that he is like him in terms of faces, arms, body-color, and so forth.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i bdud gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa'o //🔽padm'anta krita ces bya bas khro bo rta mgrin bskul la /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i bdud gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa'o // padm'anta krita ces bya bas khro bo rta mgrin bskul la /
translated: “Invincible” means that he is invincible to other demons such as the afflictions.

original: nub phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Padmantaka” is the wrathful Hayagriva, who should be visualized on a sun maṇḍala at the western gate.

original: phyogs kyi 'khor lo 'od kyis mngon par khebs byed pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyogs kyi 'khor lo 'od kyis mngon par khebs byed pa //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: “The light of the wheel of the directions completely covers” means🔽that the light of the wheel of the directions completely covers the entire world realm of a billion worlds.

original: @211b phyogs kyi 'khor lo zhes pa phyogs kyi tshogs thams cad 'od zer rnams kyis khyab par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: @211b phyogs kyi 'khor lo zhes pa phyogs kyi tshogs thams cad 'od zer rnams kyis khyab par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who is called the “wheel of directions” is so called because he pervades all the directions with his light rays.

original: 'od mdangs 'jigs dus me 'dra 'jigs par ldan //
analyzed: 'od mdangs 'jigs dus me 'dra 'jigs par ldan //
translated: He has a terrifying face, like the fire at the time of the destruction of the world.

original: zhes bya ba la 'od zer gyi tshogs 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me dang 'dra bar shin tu 'jigs skrag par byed pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'od zer gyi tshogs 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me dang 'dra bar shin tu 'jigs skrag par byed pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has a terrifying face, like the fire at the time of the destruction of the world, is so called because he has a terrifying face, like the fire at the time of the destruction of the world.

original: phyag la sogs pa gsung gi rdo rje 'dra //
analyzed: phyag la sogs pa gsung gi rdo rje 'dra //
translated: His hands and so forth are like the Vajra of Speech.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag dang zhal dang sku mdog 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag dang zhal dang sku mdog 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that his hands, faces, and body color are like Amitābha.

original: gdug pa du ma rnam gnon 'jigs pa'i zhal //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gdug pa du ma rnam gnon 'jigs pa'i zhal // zhes bya ba la /
translated: He has a terrifying face, overcoming many wicked ones.

original: gang gis gdug pa du ma rnam par gnon par mdzad cing shin tu zhal 'jigs su rung ba gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis gdug pa du ma rnam par gnon par mdzad cing shin tu zhal 'jigs su rung ba gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has a terrifying face, overcoming many wicked ones, is so called because he has a terrifying face, overcoming many wicked ones.

original: thub dbang ha ha zhes pa ni bzhad pa yis //
analyzed: thub dbang ha ha zhes pa ni bzhad pa yis //
translated: The Lord of Sages, with a “ha ha” laugh,

original: ri bor bcas pa bsgyel bas skrag mdzad pa //
analyzed: ri bor bcas pa bsgyel bas skrag mdzad pa //
translated: He is the one who frightens by toppling the mountains and all.

original: zhes bya ba la ha ha zhes bzhad pa ste //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ha ha zhes bzhad pa ste //
translated: Here, ha ha is laughter.

original: gsang mtho zhing dgod cing gang gis ri bo rnams sgyel bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gsang mtho zhing dgod cing gang gis ri bo rnams sgyel bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is the one who topples the mountains by laughing loudly and boisterously, and he is called that.

original: bighn'a nta krita ces bya bas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul la byang phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bighn'a nta krita ces bya bas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul la byang phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: By vighata-kṛt, one should invoke the wrathful Amṛtakuṇḍali and imagine him on a sun maṇḍala at the northern gate.

original: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni bgegs ma lus pa rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni bgegs ma lus pa rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The hero is the one who destroys all obstacles.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is his special feature?

original: dus mtha'i me ltar drag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dus mtha'i me ltar drag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He is said to be fierce like the fire at the end of time.

original: zad pa'i dus kyi me ste byin za shin tu drag pa yin pa dang 'dra bar rab tu gtum zhing drag pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa'i dus kyi me ste byin za shin tu drag pa yin pa dang 'dra bar rab tu gtum zhing drag pa'o //
translated: Like the fire at the end of time, which is extremely fierce, he is extremely fierce and wrathful.

original: 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ring du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ring du gyur pa'o //
translated: The noble one is the one who has gone far from sinful unwholesome phenomena.

original: zhal sogs mi bskyod dang mtshungs pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhal sogs mi bskyod dang mtshungs pa // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The faces and so forth are like Akṣobhya.

original: zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog mi bskyod pa dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog mi bskyod pa dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: This means that the faces, hands, and body color are like Akṣobhya.

original: dbang bskur ba'i dus su 'di dag gi cod pan la bdag po bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i dus su 'di dag gi cod pan la bdag po bsam par bya'o zhes bya ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: At the time of consecration, one should visualize the lords on their crowns. To show that, it is said:

original: rnam par snad mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam par snad mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Vairocana, and so on.

original: gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa la yang zlos pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir rim bzhin no zhes bya ba ste /🔽gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i cod pan la rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa @212a * //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa la yang zlos pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir rim bzhin no zhes bya ba ste / gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i cod pan la rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa @212a * //
translated: In order to prevent repetition for Yamāntaka and so on, it is said in order.

original: rim bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rim bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
translated: On the crowns of Yamāntaka and so on, one should visualize Vairocana, Akṣobhya, Amitābha, and Akṣobhya, respectively.

original: 'di rnams kyi phyag mtshan bstan par bya ba'i phyir tho ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi phyag mtshan bstan par bya ba'i phyir tho ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: To show the hand implements of these, it is said hammer and so on.

original: tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / padma dang rdo rje ni /
analyzed: tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / padma dang rdo rje ni /
translated: The hammer, club, lotus, and vajra

original: tho ba dbyig pa de bzhin padma dang // rdo rje zhes bya ste /
analyzed: tho ba dbyig pa de bzhin padma dang // rdo rje zhes bya ste /
translated: The hammer, the club, the lotus, and the vajra.

original: de la sogs pa ni ral gri la sogs pa bsnams pas de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa ni ral gri la sogs pa bsnams pas de skad ces bya ste /
translated: And so on means that they are called by those names because they hold a sword and so forth.

original: 'di yi phyag ni kun la bsam //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di yi phyag ni kun la bsam // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should imagine all the hands🔽.

original: sngar bshad ma thag pa de rnams phyag kun na bsnams par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad ma thag pa de rnams phyag kun na bsnams par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: This means that one should imagine that all the hands hold those just explained.

original: de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: In that way, in the complete maṇḍala,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim gyis so //🔽yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim gyis so // yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In that way means by the process just explained.

original: dngos po thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs shing grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la dngos po thams cad kyis bltas shing bsams nas snying po'i sngags ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i snying po ste /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs shing grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la dngos po thams cad kyis bltas shing bsams nas snying po'i sngags ni ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i snying po ste /
translated: Complete means that one should look at and imagine the complete and perfect maṇḍala with all things, and the essence mantra is the essence at the heart of the gnosis being.

original: de'i 'od zer nyid lcags kyu yin la /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer nyid lcags kyu yin la /
translated: The light rays themselves are the hook.

original: des dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu drangs shing bkug nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi mdun na bzhugs par bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: des dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu drangs shing bkug nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi mdun na bzhugs par bde bar gshegs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having summoned and drawn in the wheel of the mandala, one should visualize the Sugatas seated in front of the pledge mandala.

original: 'dis ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the invitation of the wisdom mandala.

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'i //
translated: The wheel of wisdom and means,

original: ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bdes gang bar //
analyzed: ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bdes gang bar //
translated: born of concentration, filled with the bliss of the holy,

original: 'khor lo bsam mo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: 'khor lo bsam mo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: one should contemplate.

original: shes rab ni bud med kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: shes rab ni bud med kyi tshul lo //
translated: Wisdom is the feminine mode.

original: thabs ni skyes pa lta bu ste //
analyzed: thabs ni skyes pa lta bu ste //
translated: Means is the masculine mode.

original: shes rab dang thabs dag ni shes rab dang thabs so //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs dag ni shes rab dang thabs so //
translated: Wisdom and means are wisdom and means.

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The nature of wisdom and means is the essence of wisdom and means.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin yang yin la dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang yin pas na shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin yang yin la dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang yin pas na shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Since it is the nature of wisdom and means and also stainless concentration, it is the stainless concentration of the nature of wisdom and means.

original: de las byung ba'i dam pa'i bde ba yang de nyid yin pas na de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i dam pa'i bde ba yang de nyid yin pas na de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Since that is the supreme bliss that arises from that, it is so called.

original: des kun du gang bar 'khor lo bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: des kun du gang bar 'khor lo bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the wheel filled with that.

original: gshin rje mthar byed ni gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed ni gshin rje gshed do //
translated: Yama-antardhana is Yamantaka.

original: de nyid dang por byas pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid dang por byas pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs zhes bya ste /
translated: That which is made first by that, such as Aparajita, etc., is called Yama-antardhana, etc.

original: de rnams kyis bsrung bar byas pa ni bsrung ba'i sbyor ba byas pa'o//
analyzed: de rnams kyis bsrung bar byas pa ni bsrung ba'i sbyor ba byas pa'o//
translated: That which is protected by them is the performance of protection.

original: @212b rang gi snying pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi snying pos mngon bzlas zhes bya ba ni rang gi sa bon gyis mngon par bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: @212b rang gi snying pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi snying pos mngon bzlas zhes bya ba ni rang gi sa bon gyis mngon par bzlas pa'o //
translated: With one's own essence mantra, etc. means with one's own seed mantra.

original: tsandan bzang sogs me tog gis mdzes dbul //
analyzed: tsandan bzang sogs me tog gis mdzes dbul //
translated: Beautiful with flowers of excellent sandalwood, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo de la mchod yon de lta bu dbul pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo de la mchod yon de lta bu dbul pa'o //
translated: means that such an offering is made to that mandala wheel.

original: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor de dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis gcig tu byas la rang dang 'dra bar mig la sogs pa kun du dgang zhing /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor de dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis gcig tu byas la rang dang 'dra bar mig la sogs pa kun du dgang zhing /
translated: Then, having made that maṇḍala and the samaya maṇḍala one, one should fill one’s eyes, etc., with the likeness of oneself.

original: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i bdag nyid dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlab cing rang la byas pa lta bur dbang bskur bar bsams la 'bad pas mngon par mchod par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽rang la byas pa lta bur dbang bskur zhing //
analyzed: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i bdag nyid dang 'dra bar byin gyis brlab cing rang la byas pa lta bur dbang bskur bar bsams la 'bad pas mngon par mchod par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro // rang la byas pa lta bur dbang bskur zhing //
translated: One should imagine that one is consecrated like the nature of mind, speech, and body, and one should make effort in the worship, as before.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bdag nyid /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bdag nyid /
translated: “Consecrated like oneself” means that just as oneself

original: phyogs tshogs kun na bzhugs pa'i thub pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: phyogs tshogs kun na bzhugs pa'i thub pa'i tshogs //
translated: is consecrated by the assembly of buddhas in all directions,🔽as in the lines beginning, “The assembly of sages dwelling in all directions,

original: snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag bskul //
analyzed: snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang dag bskul //
translated: who are summoned by the light rays of the essence,”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang bskur ba de bzhin du dbang bskur bar blta'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang bskur ba de bzhin du dbang bskur bar blta'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should view the consecration.

original: 'dir man ngag ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbu rgyan la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbu rgyan la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Here is the esoteric instruction: Immediately after the initiation, Akṣobhya is on the crown of the heads of the tathāgatas such as Vairocana.

original: spyan gyi dbu rgyan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //🔽m'a ma k'i'i dbu rgyan la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyan gyi dbu rgyan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do // m'a ma k'i'i dbu rgyan la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Vairocana is on the crown of the head of Locanā.🔽Akṣobhya is on the crown of the head of Māmakī.

original: gos dkar mo'i dbu rgyan la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: gos dkar mo'i dbu rgyan la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Amitābha is on the crown of the head of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: sgrol ma'i dbu rgyan la ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i dbu rgyan la ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: Amoghasiddhi is on the crown of the head of Tārā.

original: gzugs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: gzugs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Vairocana is on the crown of the head of Rūpavajrā.

translated: Just as they are, they are called “those who have hands that are radiant, excellent, playful, beautiful, and tender,” because they have hands that are radiant, excellent, playful, beautiful, and tender.

original: de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis so //

analyzed: yang 'di rnams kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir 'od kyi snang bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: 'od kyang yin la snang ba yang yin pas na 'od kyi snang ba ste /
analyzed: 'od kyang yin la snang ba yang yin pas na 'od kyi snang ba ste /

analyzed: des sprul pa ni sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ste gzugs la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o /

analyzed: sprin gyi dra ba ni mchod pa de rnams kyi sprin gyi dra ba ste /

original: des khyab pas na 'di skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: des khyab pas na 'di skad ces bya ste /

original: de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis so //

original: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /

original: dngos rnams sgyu ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dngos rnams sgyu ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: dngos rnams sgyu ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mig yor tsam du so sor snang ba tsam du zad pas na sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos rnams sgyu ma ste /

translated: Things are said to be like illusions, etc. They are just like illusions, because they are just the mere appearance of individual forms, etc.

translated: Those who have become like illusions, etc. with regard to things that are like illusions, etc.🔽are skilled in the knowledge of illusions, etc. Their knowledge of illusions, etc. is the knowledge of the individual correct discrimination of things that are like illusions, etc.

original: de ltar na dngos po rnams sgyu ma la sogs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas shing byang la de nyid shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste de yis so //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po rnams sgyu ma la sogs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas shing byang la de nyid shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste de yis so //
translated: Thus, they are skilled in the knowledge of illusions, etc. and of the individual correct discrimination of things that are like illusions, etc. up to the knowledge of the individual correct discrimination of the arts, crafts, and sciences.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What else is there?

original: rtog pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rtog pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “freed from all conceptualization,” etc.

original: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
analyzed: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
translated: Freed from all conceptualization,

original: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtog pa ma lus pa thams cad las nges par grol zhing spangs pa ste de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtog pa ma lus pa thams cad las nges par grol zhing spangs pa ste de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is said of him who is definitely liberated, who has abandoned all conceptualization characterized by subject and object.

original: mchog tu bde ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: Supreme bliss is the bliss of supreme joy.

original: de bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni de bskyed pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa yin pas na de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni de bskyed pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa yin pas na de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The cause of that is the sign of its production, hence the name.

original: de lta bu'i gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
translated: Such are the goddesses of form, etc.

original: de bzhin phyi'i dri sogs thams cad kyis / rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing //
analyzed: de bzhin phyi'i dri sogs thams cad kyis / rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing //
translated: Likewise, with all external scents and so forth, the lords of the victors are well worshipped.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod pa'o //

original: tha dad rnam par rtog las rnam par grol //
analyzed: tha dad rnam par rtog las rnam par grol //

original: zhes bya ba ni mchod par bya ba dang / mchod pa dang mchod pa po'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchod par bya ba dang / mchod pa dang mchod pa po'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: This is free from the conceptualization of the worshipped, the worship, and the worshipper.

analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags bshad pa'i yin no //
translated: The mantra for consecrating the offerings is stated with “Oṃ” and so forth.

original: da ni sgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni sgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa ston te /
translated: Now, beginning with “sound,” he teaches the praise.

original: de'i rjes la zhes bya ba la mchod pa'i rjes la rang gi yid lhag pa'i lha ru gnas pa la chos rnams bstod pa'i sgra ni byed par bsam mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

translated: After that means after the offerings, one should imagine that the sound of the praise of phenomena is made to one’s own mind abiding as the meditation deity.

translated: There, one should imagine and meditate on all the objects of sound as the words of praise. One’s own mind abiding as the meditation deity means that there is no external form of the deity.

original: rang gi yid nyid lhag pa'i lha yin te /
analyzed: rang gi yid nyid lhag pa'i lha yin te /

original: gtso bo'i lha rang gi yid nyid yin la /
analyzed: gtso bo'i lha rang gi yid nyid yin la /

original: de la chos rnams bstod pa de'i sgra sgrogs par gyur pa'o zhes /
analyzed: de la chos rnams bstod pa de'i sgra sgrogs par gyur pa'o zhes /
translated: One should meditate on the sound of the praise of phenomena resounding to that.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate in the manner that will be explained below.

original: chos thams cad bstod pa byed pa'i sgra gang gis bstod pa byed pa da bstan par @214b bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad bstod pa byed pa'i sgra gang gis bstod pa byed pa da bstan par @214b bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the sound of praise of all phenomena,

analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “Akṣhobhya,” etc.

original: bdud dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dkrug par mi nus pas na mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dkrug par mi nus pas na mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: He is called “Akṣhobhya” because he cannot be disturbed by demons, afflictions, etc.

original: de nyid ni mi phyed pa yin pas na rdo rje'o //
